translation.en: [woman 1] Whoo-hoo! -[man] Yeah! -[woman 1] Whoo-hoo!
Hey, Ian! Are you surviving?
translation.zh: 嘿 伊恩！你活下来了吗？

translation.en: We should have a little bet. Ah!
Can I have some more champagne, please?
translation.zh: 麻烦再给我来点香槟好吗？

translation.en: -We're not serving any more. -Oh, come on. Please.
translation.zh: -我们不供应酒了-拜托 别这样

translation.en: I'm awfully sorry.
Please. Please!
I'm very sorry.
Thank you.
[man] What you English will never understand is--
translation.zh: 你们这些英国人永远不会明白

translation.en: is that it is a question of identity.
No, more than identity.
I'm talking about…
Hugh, wake up!
I'm talking about a country so--
translation.zh: 我说的是一个国家 所以…

translation.en: I need to sleep.
Are you listening to me at all?
translation.zh: 你到底有没有听我说话？

translation.en: [Hugh] I'm listening. I'm listening to every word.
translation.zh: 我在听呢 每个字都听进去了

translation.en: You're not listening.
-What are you doing? -Here is what I am gonna do.
I want to feel something real!
translation.zh: 我想要感受真实的东西！

translation.en: Here is something real!
Yes!
-Bring it over! He's dying! He needs it! -[band finishes]
translation.zh: 快拿过来！他快憋死了！太急需了！

translation.en: -Behold the glassy waters of the Isis! -[man] Shut up, Paul!
translation.zh: 看伊希斯湖那汪清泉！ 闭嘴 保罗！

translation.en: -Love you, too, even you doubters! -Oh, put a sock in it!
translation.zh: 我也爱你和你的夏尔多涅香槟！ 你快闭嘴吧！

translation.en: -Paul, come back! -We make hay today!
You know, the dream is coming to an end, and we have to celebrate that!
translation.zh: 梦想即将结束 我们得庆祝一番！

translation.en: -We have to celebrate! Come on! -Oh, thank God. Tell him to get out.
translation.zh: -我们得庆祝一番！来吧！-谢天谢地 让他快滚

translation.en: If he wishes to go for a midnight swim, that's entirely his decision.
translation.zh: 他若想半夜去游泳那完全是他的自由

translation.en: [grunts] I don't want to go swimming.
I want to throw myself into the water in despair at our mad generation.
translation.zh: 我们疯狂的一代让人绝望我真想一头扎进水里

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Excellent. Go ahead.
Mm. Let me have it.
Stop drinking.
Please.
Pl… please. Ugh.
-[Paul] Mmm! -Come on! There's three of us here.
translation.zh: 快别亲了！这儿有三个人呢

translation.en: Now you're just doing it because I'm here.
translation.zh: 你们俩就是故意亲给我看的

translation.en: Look at this boy.
So English. So English!
-Leave him alone! -Always this!
-What's wrong with being English? -This is what I've learned at Oxford.
translation.zh: -英国人怎么了嘛？-这是我在牛津学到的

translation.en: -We have another lesson. -The great characteristic of the English…
translation.zh: 我们还学到另一个教训 英国人最大的特质就是保持距离

translation.en: -[Hugh] Mm-hm? -…is distance.
translation.zh: 英国人最大的特质就是保持距离

translation.en: -Hmm. -Yes! Not only from one another but from feeling.
translation.zh: 对 不仅是人与人之间的疏远还有情感方面

translation.en: -Mm. Mm-hm. -We are nothing but feeling.
-[woman] Mm-hm. -There's a new age beginning.
[in German] In the New Germany. You can look forward to that.
translation.zh: 在新德国 尽情期待吧

translation.en: The New Germany.
-[in English] Yes. -It's a bunch of thugs and racists.
translation.zh: -是啊-一群暴徒和种族主义者而已

translation.en: -Germany is the proudest nation on earth. -[Hugh] Really?
translation.zh: 德国是地球上最骄傲的国家

translation.en: You'll see when you stay with us in Munich. You'll see.
translation.zh: 你来慕尼黑跟我们一起住就知道了到时你就会知道

translation.en: -Right. -I'll protect you.
[in German] Give me a cigarette.
[in English] No. It's my last one.
translation.zh: 不行 我只有最后一支了

translation.en: -We'll have to share. -I'll take it.
-You're good. -You can do it.
-Keep it in. -Mm-hm.
-Okay, okay. -Is it hot?
It's our mad generation!
It's our mad generation.
-Beautiful. -Yeah.
[woman 1 shouting] Gas masks! Don't you want to come see?
translation.zh: （六年后 伦敦） （你的防毒面具呢？）

translation.en: -Gas masks! Come and get your masks now! -[man 1] Will you pull on that rope?
translation.zh: 你可以拉好那根绳子吗？

translation.en: If you don't know how, I'll get your mother to show ya!
translation.zh: 你做不来的话 我请你老娘来教你！

translation.en: -Excuse me. -It's all right.
[man 1] Right. Don't-- Just shut it, and get on with it!
translation.zh: 好了 闭上嘴巴 继续干活！

translation.en: Now pull on the left!
That's it, gentle, not too much!
translation.zh: 动作轻点 别太使劲！

translation.en: -You need to hold her steady. -[man 2] Yeah!
[man 1] Yes, that's good. Keep her steady.
That's better, lads. Now we're performing.
translation.zh: 好多了 伙计们 这样就对了

translation.en: No, no, no, look. For God's sake, she's stuck on the stonework!
translation.zh: 不对 瞧瞧 老天 气球卡在石墙上了

translation.en: -[man 2] Careful! -[man 1] Just be gentle. Gentle.
-[man 3] Come on! -What are you doing, wrenching it about?
translation.zh: 来啊！把你那端往左边拉！

translation.en: -[man 3] I'm trying! -Well, try--
[man 4] This-- this side.
[man 5] Watch out!
[woman 2] Is that right?
[man 3] Come on, guys.
[man 7] They'll stop anything flying.
translation.zh: 这种东西能阻拦所有飞行器

translation.en: [Hugh] I know. I said I'd be on time.
translation.zh: 我知道 我说过会准时到

translation.en: There's no need for the sackcloth and ashes.
-I was late myself. -Oh.
-[chuckles] -Thank you.
-What's this? -It's Arthur's gas mask.
-I've just been to collect it. -[sighs]
Didn't realise they made them in children's sizes.
translation.zh: 我之前都不知道他们还生产儿童尺寸的

translation.en: Well, it's new to all of us, isn't it?
translation.zh: 这对我们来说都是新鲜事 对吧？

translation.en: Apparently, when the call comes, I have to put his on first.
translation.zh: 看来警报响起时 我得先给他戴上

translation.en: -Tests motherly devotion, don't you think? -Hm.
translation.zh: 这是对母爱的考验 你不觉得吗？

translation.en: Can I have a drink? I'm parched.
-Half a bottle of Chablis. -Certainly, sir.
translation.zh: -来半瓶夏布利-没问题 先生

translation.en: -Half? -Work.
-What's going on over there? -I can't talk about it.
translation.zh: -你那边是什么情况？-我不能说

translation.en: I don't think anyone's listening.
Hitler wants the Sudetenland.
translation.zh: 希特勒想侵占苏台德地区

translation.en: He expected the Czechs to roll over, but he's underestimated them.
translation.zh: 他以为捷克人会乖乖听话但他低估了他们

translation.en: -Yes, I-- -They won't give it up without a fight.
translation.zh: - 对 我…-他们不会不战而降

translation.en: If there's no agreement tomorrow, Germany will mobilise,
translation.zh: 如果明天不能达成协议德国将进行动员

translation.en: and France and Britain will be obliged to defend Czechoslovakia.
translation.zh: 法国和英国则必须保卫捷克斯洛伐克

translation.en: As soon as that happens--
Thank you.
Remember eating lunch here the day after the wedding?
translation.zh: 还记得婚礼次日来这儿吃饭吗？

translation.en: Yes, Hugh. I got poisoned by that dreadful fish.
translation.zh: 记得 休 那条可怕的鱼害我中毒了

translation.en: Yes. Sorry. God!
translation.zh: 是啊 抱歉 老天！

translation.en: -Sorry, I forgot. -[laughing] It's all right.
Still, it's one of the best spots in London.
translation.zh: 我依然觉得这是伦敦最好的餐厅之一

translation.en: Mm. Yes.
I wish we could go upstairs,
translation.zh: 真希望我们能到楼上去

translation.en: take a room, and stay in bed all afternoon.
translation.zh: 开个房间 在床上缠绵一下午

translation.en: Well, what's stopping us?
Arthur's with Nanny, and, well, this place hardly seems full.
translation.zh: 亚瑟有保姆照顾这地方好像也没那么多人

translation.en: [whispers] Why don't you go and see if you can arrange it?
translation.zh: 你可以去问问能不能安排

translation.en: You know I can't.
-Do I? -I'm due back at 2:30.
-Why would you ask me-- -You brought it up.
I'm trying to make an effort. As requested.
translation.zh: 我按你的要求 在尽力做了

translation.en: I know.
Mr. Legat, Downing Street is on the line for you.
translation.zh: 勒加特先生 唐宁街打电话找您

translation.en: [groans] Hell.
I have to take it.
Of course.
-I thought, perhaps, some privacy. -Thank you.
translation.zh: 我想还是隐秘一些的好 谢谢

translation.en: This is Legat.
[man] I'm afraid you'll have to come back, old man. Cleverly's asking for you.
translation.zh: 恐怕你得马上赶回来 克莱弗利在找你看来柏林的会谈结束了

translation.en: -Looks as though talking's over in Berlin. -Sh…
translation.zh: 克莱弗利在找你看来柏林的会谈结束了

translation.en: Sir Horace Wilson's flying home.
translation.zh: 霍勒斯威尔逊爵士即将搭机回国

translation.en: I'm on my way.
As fast as you can. He'll kill us both.
translation.zh: 越快越好 否则他会宰了我们俩

translation.en: Shit.
-[wife] 83 Lord North Street, please. -[man] What surname?
Lunch at the Imperial Grand in the middle of an international crisis.
translation.zh: 国际危机当前还有心情去帝国大酒店吃午餐

translation.en: Might be the way things are done in the Foreign Office--
translation.zh: 这可能是外交部的做事方式…

translation.en: I apologise, sir. It won't happen again.
translation.zh: 抱歉 长官 绝不会有下次

translation.en: No explanation?
It's my wedding anniversary.
translation.zh: 今天是我的结婚纪念日

translation.en: Congratulations.
There are times when one's family has to take a back seat.
translation.zh: 在某些非常时期我们不妨将家事暂搁一旁

translation.en: Now is such a time.
-Has Syers filled you in? -I gather talks have broken down.
translation.zh: -塞耶斯把情况跟你说了吗？-我听说谈判破裂了

translation.en: All hell's about to break loose. Hitler intends to mobilise tomorrow.
translation.zh: 要天下大乱了希特勒打算明天进行动员

translation.en: At six o'clock, the PM will make a radio broadcast to the nation,
translation.zh: 首相将于下午6点向全国发表广播演说

translation.en: and I'd like you to deal with the BBC.
translation.zh: 我希望你去跟英国广播公司交涉

translation.en: Has any-- Excuse me, sir. Has anyone spoken to the Czechs?
translation.zh: 有没有…抱歉 先生有人跟捷克方面谈过吗？

translation.en: What?
-I just thought that bringing the Czech-- -I'm sure the PM
translation.zh: -什么？-我只是觉得让捷克… 我确信首相不需要你的建议 勒加特

translation.en: doesn't require suggestions from you, Legat.
translation.zh: 我确信首相不需要你的建议 勒加特

translation.en: Yes, sir.
[man] I have to say, this comes at the worst possible time for us, Prime Minister.
translation.zh: 我不得不说消息来得真不是时候 首相

translation.en: Prime Minister, Sir Horace is here.
translation.zh: 首相 霍勒斯爵士来了

translation.en: Well, it would seem you have some work to do, gentlemen.
translation.zh: 看来你们还有工作要做 先生们

translation.en: -Please don't let me stand in your way. -Prime Minister.
translation.zh: -别因为我妨碍你们做事-首相

translation.en: Shall I show him in, sir?
translation.zh: 我请他进来吗 先生？

translation.en: Oh, certainly.
Horace?
[Wilson] Thank you, Osmund.
-Prime Minister. -Aah.
I expect you're pleased to be back.
translation.zh: 你回国了 一定很高兴吧

translation.en: How was it? How did it go?
Ah, well, it started atrociously and went downhill from there.
translation.zh: 开始就很糟糕 后来更是一落千丈

translation.en: He won't wait a day longer before invading.
I warned him this morning that if the French fulfil their obligations,
translation.zh: 今早我警告过他若是法国人恪守义务

translation.en: then we'll have to go in with them.
What did he say to that?
-He smiled at me. -God!
Even more disconcerting than when he's shouting.
translation.zh: 他大喊大叫时 更加令人不安

translation.en: But the message was clear enough.
He's going to mobilise tomorrow.
[in German] Nice dress she's wearing.
[officer 2] For the parade.
Sir, have you chosen something yet?
-Coffee, black. -Right away.
Hello.
How did it go?
-Anything for you, sir? -No, thank you.
translation.zh: -您要点什么吗 先生？-不了 谢谢

translation.en: Today, he did nothing but yell at them.
translation.zh: 今天他只是冲他们大吼大叫

translation.en: The talks with the English are over once and for all. He's fed up.
translation.zh: 跟英国方面彻底谈崩了 他很懊恼

translation.en: Eventually, Henderson just stayed silent.
translation.zh: 最终 韩德森只是保持沉默

translation.en: Wilson got up and left. Right to the airport and back to London.
translation.zh: 威尔逊起身离开直奔机场 飞回伦敦了

translation.en: And to prove that he means business,
this madman is now sending a parade of tanks up Wilhemstraße.
translation.zh: 这个疯子现在要在威廉大街上举行一次坦克游行

translation.en: -Straight to the British Embassy. -So?
translation.zh: -直奔英国大使馆而去-所以呢？

translation.en: So, we'll mobilise tomorrow.
-Are you sure? -I'm sure.
Then we only have a few hours left.
translation.zh: 那我们只剩几个小时了

translation.en: Oster is talking to the generals right now.
translation.zh: 此时奥斯特正在和将军们谈话

translation.en: We'll meet tonight.
New place, Alt-Berlin. Ten o'clock.
translation.zh: 新地点 柏林旧城 晚上10点

translation.en: I have to get back.
Damn, I really am scared shitless.
translation.zh: 该死 我现在真的怕死了

translation.en: [girl 1] Can we feed the pigeons?
-[girl 2] Yes. -[man] Oh, they're hungry.
-What's your name? -[girl 2] Margarete.
-[man] Here. -[girl 1] Come here.
[man] You're not afraid of me, are you?
-Frau Limpert? -Yes?
-I'll take care of it. -All right.
-Can you tell Herr Plassman, please? -I will.
translation.zh: -你可以告诉普拉斯曼先生吗？-好的

translation.en: -Here, let me. -I can do it.
translation.zh: 来 我来吧 我可以的

translation.en: -Herr von Hartmann. -I can do it.
There.
May I?
[announcer, in English] This is London.
In a moment, you will hear the prime minister,
the Right Honourable Neville Chamberlain,
translation.zh: 尊敬的内维尔张伯伦阁下

translation.en: speaking from Number 10 Downing Street.
His speech will be heard all over the Empire,
translation.zh: 他的演说将传遍整个大英帝国

translation.en: throughout the continent of America,
and in a large number of foreign countries.
Mr. Chamberlain.
I want to say a few words to you, men and women of Britain and the Empire.
translation.zh: 大英帝国的民众 我有几句话想对你们说

translation.en: How horrible and fantastic it is
that we should be digging trenches and trying on gas masks here
translation.zh: 一群我们对其一无所知的人发生了争吵

translation.en: because of a quarrel in a faraway country
translation.zh: 我们就应该在这里挖战壕戴上防毒面具

translation.en: -between people of whom we know nothing. -[scribbling]
translation.zh: 这是多么可怕 多么怪诞的事

translation.en: Both Herr Hitler and the Czechs
have made their case regarding the Sudetenland passionately.
translation.zh: 都对苏台德地区充满热情

translation.en: Herr Hitler has told me privately,
translation.zh: 希特勒先生私下告诉过我

translation.en: and last night repeated publicly,
that when this question is settled,
translation.zh: 一旦这个问题得到解决

translation.en: it is the end of Germany's territorial claims in Europe.
translation.zh: 德国在欧洲的领土纠纷就会终结

translation.en: [in German] Damn fool.
[Chamberlain, in English] Now, I ask you to await,
as calmly as you can,
the events of the next few days.
As long as war has not begun,
there is always hope that it may be prevented.
And you know that I am going to work for peace
translation.zh: 你们知道我会努力争取和平

translation.en: to the last moment.
Good night.
-And you're off air, Prime Minister. -Oh, good.
translation.zh: 广播演说已结束 首相

translation.en: -Well done, sir. No wobbles at all. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 非常好 先生 一字不错

translation.en: Uh, photograph.
There we are. As if I'm reading.
translation.zh: 好了 拍我读稿的样子

translation.en: Very good. Thank you so much.
-Well navigated, sir. -Ah.
[chuckles] Thank you.
Do you know, I always think the trick is to try to imagine I'm just speaking
translation.zh: 我一直认为演说的诀窍就是试着想象

translation.en: to one person sitting at home in an armchair.
translation.zh: 我只是跟一个坐在家里扶手椅上的人说话

translation.en: Of course, tonight, it was a little bit harder
translation.zh: 当然 今晚稍微难一点

translation.en: because there was somebody else lurking in the shadows.
translation.zh: 因为有另外一个人潜伏在暗处

translation.en: Herr Hitler.
RADIO ADDRESS OF THE BRITISH PRIME MINISTER NEVILLE CHAMBERLAIN
translation.zh: （英国首相内维尔张伯伦发表广播演说）

translation.en: [in German] You're taking it to the Chancellery yourself?
translation.zh: 你要亲自送到总理府去吗？

translation.en: Yes. I'm very curious to see how Hitler will reply.
translation.zh: 是的 我很想知道希特勒会作何回应

translation.en: -What about after? -After?
After.
-After, I have an appointment in Mitte. -I see. An "appointment"?
translation.zh: -之后 我在米特跟人有约-明白了 “有约”？

translation.en: Yes.
How mysterious.
Well, until next time, Herr von Hartmann.
translation.zh: 下次再见再说 冯哈特曼先生

translation.en: Mrs. Winter.
-[in English] For goodness' sake! -All right!
translation.zh: 拜托！应该先放那个进去！

translation.en: -That should have gone in first. -Got everything in hand. Cecily? Yes, that's got to go.
translation.zh: 一切准备就绪莱斯利？对 可以出发了

translation.en: -Where should I sit? -You off, then, Appleby?
-We are. -I'll sit in the front.
-Good luck with it. -Thank you.
-Be well. -[Cecily] I'll sit in the front, then.
[Appleby] Come along, dear.
Christ!
Arthur?
I'm sorry, I-- I wasn't expecting…
Hello.
-What was that? -[sighs]
-He made me jump. -He's been waiting for you.
translation.zh: -他吓了我一跳-他一直在等你

translation.en: I'm glad you're home.
I have to grab my overnight bag and get back. I don't have long.
translation.zh: 我得拿上小旅行包赶回去不能在家久留

translation.en: You're staying over?
-Apparently, I'm needed. -Well, you're needed here too.
translation.zh: 很显然 工作需要我 家里也需要你

translation.en: -[sighs] -What's happening?
Pack a week's worth of clothes, and drive him to your parents' right away.
translation.zh: 收拾够一周换洗的衣服马上开车带他去你父母那里

translation.en: Can you tell me why?
I need to know you're somewhere safe.
translation.zh: 我需要知道你们待在安全的地方

translation.en: -I won't go without you. -Oh, Pamela. I'm afraid you have to.
translation.zh: -没有你 我不会去-帕梅拉 恐怕你必须去

translation.en: -By tonight, it could be hard to get out. -Tell them you have a son,
translation.zh: 到了今晚 要离开伦敦恐怕就难了 告诉他们你有个儿子今晚我们需要你！

translation.en: -and we need you tonight! -I have no power--
translation.zh: 告诉他们你有个儿子今晚我们需要你！ 我无权…

translation.en: -You can go tomorrow. -Impossible. It's too important.
translation.zh: -你可以明天再去-不可能 这事太重要了

translation.en: It's not more important than your family.
translation.zh: 不可能比你的家人还重要

translation.en: -That's very clear. -Darling, I--
translation.zh: -好吧 很清楚了-亲爱的 我…

translation.en: Get off me!
-You're being unreasonable. -Right, I'm being unreasonable?
translation.zh: -你太不讲理了-对 我不讲理？

translation.en: I'm always hysterical in the face of your fucking calmness!
translation.zh: 面对你该死的冷静我总是歇斯底里！

translation.en: Do you not think there are things worth--
translation.zh: 难道你就不觉得有些东西值得…这是你的婚姻

translation.en: I mean, this is your marriage. This is your family!
translation.zh: 难道你就不觉得有些东西值得…这是你的婚姻 这是你的家庭！

translation.en: And I know I'm upset, and I know how much you hate that,
translation.zh: 我知道我很生气我知道你有多讨厌这样

translation.en: but your silence is killing me!
translation.zh: 但你的沉默简直要把我逼疯！

translation.en: We'll be packed and gone in an hour.
translation.zh: 我们会收拾好 一小时后离开

translation.en: No one forced you to marry me, Hugh.
translation.zh: 没人强迫你娶我 休

translation.en: You act like it's a sentence from a judge.
translation.zh: 你表现得好像这婚姻是法官给你判的刑

translation.en: -You chose this. -I don't--
It is not my fault that you are disappointed by your life.
translation.zh: 你对自己的生活失望 不是我的错

translation.en: -I can't talk about this now. -Right, yes. Of course you can't.
translation.zh: -我现在不能跟你聊这个-对啊 你当然不能

translation.en: -[in German] Get that stuff in there. -We need two people for the couch.
translation.zh: -把东西搬进去-沙发得两个人抬

translation.en: -Pictures. -I need to do this first.
[woman] Do you need a worker?
Do you need a worker?
HELLO! I AM LOOKING FOR WORK!
Do you need a worker?
Paulie? No way. I can't believe it.
translation.zh: 小保罗？不会吧 真不敢相信

translation.en: Franz Sauer.
-Little Paulie! -How are you?
Still busy as a beaver. How about you? Where are you headed?
translation.zh: 还是忙得团团转 你呢？要去哪里？

translation.en: To the British Embassy.
I'm delivering the official reply to Chamberlain's radio broadcast.
translation.zh: 我要去送针对张伯伦广播演说的正式回函

translation.en: -Seriously? -Yes.
No kidding?
Who would've thought that you'd be delivering messages between world leaders?
translation.zh: 谁能想到你会负责替世界领袖传话？

translation.en: -And I'd be protecting the Führer himself. -You're with the bodyguard?
translation.zh: -而我负责保护元首本人-你是保镖？

translation.en: Führer Escort Command.
-One of 27. -Congratulations.
-Paulie, one of just 27. -Congratulations.
translation.zh: 小保罗 27护卫之一 恭喜

translation.en: But everyone always knew that you'd make it to the top one day.
translation.zh: 但大家向来都知道你总有一天会出人头地

translation.en: -It baffles me every day that I have. -Nonsense. We've always been winners.
translation.zh: -我每天都觉得很困惑-胡说 我们一直是赢家

translation.en: -Not me. -Always.
-Back on our soccer team? -But no thanks to me.
translation.zh: -要不要重新加入我们的足球队？-不用 谢了

translation.en: That was you, Franz. Our opposition peed their pants in fear of you.
translation.zh: 都是你的功劳 弗兰茨你能把对手吓得尿裤子

translation.en: Yeah, there was no getting past. Certainly not past me.
translation.zh: 对 没法绕过去 肯定过不了我这关

translation.en: Well, Paul, don't let me keep you. Hurry along. Duty calls.
translation.zh: 保罗 别让我耽搁你正事快走吧 工作要紧

translation.en: I'll see you around, Franz.
Not if I see you first, Paulie von Hartmann!
translation.zh: 说不定我先来看你小保罗冯哈特曼！

translation.en: [man] Hey! Those aren't your potatoes!
translation.zh: 嘿！那些土豆不是你们的！

translation.en: [in English] Hugh! You're to take this straight upstairs to the PM.
translation.zh: 休！你直接把这个拿上楼 交给首相

translation.en: -What is it? -Reply from Berlin. -Hurry! -Oh!
translation.zh: -是什么？-柏林的回函 赶快！

translation.en: Here. Thank you.
We'd be abandoning the people of Czechoslovakia to the Nazis.
translation.zh: 我们要抛弃捷克人民把他们扔给纳粹

translation.en: -We would not be abandoning them. -Excuse me, sir.
translation.zh: 我们不会抛弃他们 打扰一下 长官这是希特勒对您广播演说的回函

translation.en: -It's Hitler's reply to your broadcast. -Ah, good. Good, good, good.
translation.zh: 打扰一下 长官这是希特勒对您广播演说的回函 很好

translation.en: Well?
[Chamberlain] No. He's not changing his mind.
You know, we might…
Uh, Legat, would you fetch my copy of The Times from my office?
translation.zh: 勒加特 去我办公室把那份《泰晤士报》取来好吗？

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -Oh, I've got one here.
translation.zh: 好 长官 我这里有一份

translation.en: -Right. Is it today's? -Yes.
[Chamberlain] Oh, good. Now, let's see what we've got here.
translation.zh: 很好 看看上面有什么新闻

translation.en: -Hitler's speech is page 17, sir. -17, very good.
translation.zh: -希特勒的演说在第17页 先生-17页 很好

translation.en: There we are. Good. Now, there's…
translation.zh: 找到了 好 现在…

translation.en: Something has been niggling at me since I read this.
translation.zh: 读了这篇演说后有个问题一直困扰着我

translation.en: "We never found a single great power in Europe
translation.zh: “在欧洲 我们从未发现有哪一位大国领导人

translation.en: with a man at its head who has as much understanding
translation.zh: 能够像我的好朋友贝尼托墨索里尼这般

translation.en: for the distress of our people
as my great friend Benito Mussolini."
-See what I mean? -Yes.
I'm not sure I do.
If Herr Hitler is not going to listen to me…
translation.zh: 若希特勒先生不肯听我的话

translation.en: …maybe he'll listen to his great friend
translation.zh: 或许他肯听信他的好朋友

translation.en: Benito Mussolini.
Now, Legat, I want you to take this to the cipher room
translation.zh: 勒加特 你把这个送去译电室

translation.en: and have it telegraphed immediately to Jimmy Drummond,
translation.zh: 立即发电报给我们的驻罗马大使

translation.en: -our ambassador in Rome. -Yes, Prime Minister.
translation.zh: 吉米德拉蒙德 是 首相

translation.en: Hadn't you better tell the foreign secretary you're writing to the Italians?
translation.zh: 难道不应该跟外交部长打声招呼说您给意大利人写信吗？

translation.en: Oh, damn the foreign secretary.
Oh, Legat, forget you heard that.
translation.zh: 勒加特 就当你什么都没听到

translation.en: [man 1, in German] Scrub…
Look at them! Watch closely!
This is the place where the Jew belongs.
translation.zh: 犹太人就该待在这种地方

translation.en: -[horn beeps] -[man 1] Keep scrubbing!
I said keep scrubbing!
Into the cracks, as well. Keep scrubbing! I said keep scrubbing!
translation.zh: 缝隙也要擦继续擦！我说了继续擦！

translation.en: [man 2] You missed a spot!
Look at him, this Jewish pig!
translation.zh: 看看他 这只犹太猪！

translation.en: How his presence ruined the very ground!
translation.zh: 他的存在把整块地都糟践了！

translation.en: [woman sings in German] ♪ Your soft breath gives solace… ♪
translation.zh: 你轻柔的呼吸给予我慰藉…

translation.en: The cracks as well.
Keep scrubbing! I said keep scrubbing!
♪ In your arms ♪
♪ For hours walking barefoot ♪
♪ Over the soft moss ♪
♪ You're silently dreaming ♪
♪ Of strange star signs ♪
♪ The golden locks ♪
♪ Kindled by the moon ♪
♪ I see the longing ♪
♪ But you can't stay… ♪
-Sorry. -Thought you'd got lost.
What?
Very strange to meet you here, Lieutenant Colonel.
translation.zh: 在这里见到你 我觉得很奇怪 中校

translation.en: -I've never seen you out of uniform. -One second.
Andi, three schnapps.
translation.zh: 安迪 来三杯杜松子酒

translation.en: [Andi] Three schnapps, coming right up.
translation.zh: 三杯杜松子酒 马上来

translation.en: Go ahead.
Everyone was there, all the top-ranking defence generals.
translation.zh: 所有人都到场了所有的高级国防将领

translation.en: And they all confirmed again
that there is strong opposition to a war with the Czechs.
translation.zh: 反对与捷克开战的呼声很强烈

translation.en: This is the moment we've been waiting for.
translation.zh: 这就是我们翘首以待的时刻

translation.en: At two o'clock tomorrow, when Hitler gives the order to invade,
translation.zh: 明天下午2点当希特勒下令入侵时

translation.en: the Wehrmacht will step in.
-And the three of us are the key. -What exactly does that mean?
translation.zh: -而我们三人是关键-到底是什么意思？

translation.en: We go to the Chancellery.
We make sure that all important entry points are clear.
translation.zh: 确保所有重要入口都安全无恙

translation.en: Then we give the signal to step in, and Hitler will be arrested.
translation.zh: 然后我们发出介入的信号希特勒就会被捕

translation.en: You believe that the Wehrmacht will take action against him?
translation.zh: 你认为国防军会采取行动对付他吗？

translation.en: War with the Czechs, that's…
That means war with Britain and France.
translation.zh: 这就意味着要同英法开战

translation.en: That's crazy! It's the last thing the generals want.
translation.zh: 太疯狂了！这是将军们最不愿看到的事

translation.en: Right, Hans. But still, I don't trust the generals.
translation.zh: 对 汉斯 可我还是不相信那些将军

translation.en: They're not opposed to him.
They're just opposed to war because they're scared they'll lose it.
translation.zh: 他们反对的是战争 因为他们怕输

translation.en: Is this really the only plan?
translation.zh: 这真的是唯一的计划吗？

translation.en: [Hans] It's the only plan we have, Erich.
translation.zh: 这是我们唯一的计划 埃里希

translation.en: [Erich] It all sounds so incredibly fragile.
translation.zh: 这一切听起来实在太不可靠了

translation.en: Have you ever wondered if we're wrong?
translation.zh: 你们有没有想过要是我们错了呢？

translation.en: What if we're mistaken?
translation.zh: 要是我们搞错了怎么办？

translation.en: What if he's right, and he's telling the truth
translation.zh: 万一他是对的 他说的是实话

translation.en: that he just wants to take back the territories that belong to Germany?
translation.zh: 他只是想夺回属于德国的领土呢？

translation.en: -And he'll stop there? -Then leave, Erich.
translation.zh: 然后他就会收手？ 那你走吧 埃里希

translation.en: He's a small, vulgar man. Hitler is like a thug.
translation.zh: 他就是个矮小粗俗的人 希特勒就像个暴徒

translation.en: He only knows his own personal truth. He'll keep taking more and more.
translation.zh: 他有什么企图只有他自己知道他只会变本加厉 欲壑难填

translation.en: -More people will get hurt. -How do you know?
translation.zh: -会有更多的人受到伤害-你怎么知道？

translation.en: -He'll never stop! -It's not the time to argue!
translation.zh: -他永远不会收手！-现在不是争吵的时候

translation.en: -Tomorrow, tomorrow is the day-- -[Andi] Three schnapps.
translation.zh: -明天 明天就是…-三杯杜松子酒

translation.en: Are you with us, Erich?
translation.zh: 你要加入我们吗 埃里希？

translation.en: Let's assume Hitler gets arrested tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我们假设明天希特勒被捕

translation.en: What happens then?
We shoot the bastard.
translation.zh: 我们一枪崩了那个混蛋

translation.en: If he doesn't surrender.
Tomorrow at two o'clock, we will hear that mobilisation is beginning.
translation.zh: 明天下午2点我们会听到动员开始的消息

translation.en: That will be our cue.
Friends, history is watching us.
translation.zh: 朋友们 历史在注视着我们

translation.en: Sometime tomorrow night,
this whole nightmare will be over.
translation.zh: 这整个噩梦就会彻底结束

translation.en: -♪ I see the longing… ♪ -[sighs]
♪ But you can't stay ♪
♪ Come dance through the blue night ♪
translation.zh: 穿过蓝色之夜 来跳舞吧

translation.en: ♪ With me one more time ♪
-[Winter] What? You want to arrest him? -[Paul] That's the plan, yeah.
translation.zh: -什么？你们想逮捕他？-计划是这样 对

translation.en: -You think that could work? -Yes.
This Wehrmacht will turn against the boss?
translation.zh: 国防军会背叛他们的顶头上司吗？

translation.en: Never. Mark my word. I was married to a general.
translation.zh: 永远不会 记住我的话我以前嫁给了一位将军

translation.en: -Your husband was a disloyal arsehole. -Yes, to me, maybe, but never to Hitler.
translation.zh: 你丈夫就是个不忠的混球 是 对我可能不忠但对希特勒从来不会

translation.en: When he mobilises tomorrow, we will stop him.
translation.zh: 他明天进行动员时 我们会阻止他

translation.en: -You want him to mobilise? -Yes, damn it!
translation.zh: -你想让他进行动员吗？-对 真该死！

translation.en: [whispers] If he doesn't go to war, you can't stop him.
translation.zh: 如果他不开战 你们就无法阻止他

translation.en: But, Paul, that means you need this war. That's totally perverse.
translation.zh: 不过保罗 这说明你们需要这场战争这完全是悖谬

translation.en: Of course that's perverse, Helen. Without a crime, there can be no arrest.
translation.zh: 当然是悖谬 海伦他没犯罪 就不能逮捕他

translation.en: What?
I'm considering if I should trust you.
translation.zh: 我在考虑该不该信任你

translation.en: -You've already trusted me. -This is something different.
What is it?
FOREIGN OFFICE POLITICAL DEPARTMENT
What's this?
I got it from the Foreign Office. I took it today.
translation.zh: 我从外交部拿到的 我今天拿的

translation.en: What's this?
This is his true plan for Europe.
translation.zh: 这是他对欧洲的真正计划

translation.en: PROTOCOL OF THE MEETING IN THE CHANCELLERY ON NOVEMBER 5, 1937
They'll arrest you for this.
I'm aware.
-This is appalling. -What are you going to do with it?
translation.zh: -简直骇人听闻-你打算怎么做？

translation.en: What are you going to do with it?
Come in.
Letting you know I'll be upstairs, sir. If you need me.
translation.zh: 跟您说一声 如果您需要我 长官我就在楼上

translation.en: Righto. Oh, you're on tonight, are you?
translation.zh: 好的 今晚你值班 是吗？

translation.en: Yes, sir. I'm here till the morning.
translation.zh: 是的 长官 我值夜班 直到明早

translation.en: Oh, good. Any reply from Rome?
Not yet, sir.
But, you know, it wasn't built in a day.
translation.zh: 但您知道 罗马毕竟不是一天建成的

translation.en: Far as I can see, they haven't finished it yet. [chuckles]
Are you an Oxford man?
Yes, Prime Minister.
Aah. Come on in. Close the door a minute.
Terribly draughty, this place.
-What did you read at Oxford? -German.
translation.zh: -你在牛津念的是什么专业？-德语

translation.en: Did they teach you to write English as well?
[laughs] Well, they did their best.
I was more of a talker than a writer, though, sir. Debating was my thing.
translation.zh: 比起写 我更擅长说 先生辩论是我的长项

translation.en: -Debating? -Yes, sir.
Well, you've come to the right place.
It's all anybody seems to do here is to debate.
translation.zh: 似乎这里所有的人都只会辩论

translation.en: Listen, I've got something I'm going to ask you to do.
It's a little bit impertinent, but this is my speech for tomorrow to the House.
translation.zh: 有点冒昧但这是我要去下议院做的演说

translation.en: But I-- I feel somehow it doesn't flow,
and maybe-- maybe an Oxford man, who… who debates and… and reads German,
translation.zh: 或许擅长辩论精通德语的牛津高材生

translation.en: might be able to improve it a little.
-Would you mind? -Of course, Prime Minister.
translation.zh: -能请你帮这个忙吗？-当然可以 首相

translation.en: Thank you so much.
-Very good. Good night. -Good night, sir.
translation.zh: -非常好 晚安-晚安 长官

translation.en: -Make sure you got your camera. -Ready?
Nothing from Rome, Prime Minister.
translation.zh: 罗马没有任何消息 首相

translation.en: Oh. Huh.
Still early. Just have to be patient and wait.
Do you know,
I'd gladly stand against that wall and be shot if it prevented war.
translation.zh: 若能阻止战争我心甘情愿靠着那面墙 被人击毙

translation.en: Come here.
I wish you wouldn't say things like that.
translation.zh: 我希望你不要说这样的话

translation.en: -Hmm. -At least not before lunch.
Of course, you were too young to serve in the Great War, Legat.
translation.zh: 当然了 勒加特一战时你年纪尚小 未能参战

translation.en: And I was too old.
Somehow, that made things worse.
translation.zh: 在某种程度上 这让事情变得更糟

translation.en: It is absolute agony to…
see such suffering and…
feel so powerless.
Now every time I…
pass a war memorial or…
visit one of those vast cemeteries in France,
translation.zh: 或者探访法国那些大片的墓地时

translation.en: where so many of my friends lie buried,
translation.zh: 我很多朋友都埋葬在那边

translation.en: I vow that if I find myself in the position
translation.zh: 我都会发誓 要是我有权

translation.en: where I could prevent such a catastrophe from happening again,
translation.zh: 能阻止这样的灾难再次发生

translation.en: I shall do anything…
sacrifice anything…
to maintain the peace.
This is sacred to me.
I understand.
Ah, it's not that we're militarily unprepared for war.
translation.zh: 这并不是说 对于战争我们在军事上没有未雨绸缪

translation.en: That can be remedied, is being remedied.
translation.zh: 这倒是可以补救 也正在补救

translation.en: It's-- it is rather that I… I fear for the spiritual wellbeing of our people
translation.zh: 我更担心的是若是看不到国家领导人

translation.en: if they don't see their leaders doing everything, absolutely everything,
translation.zh: 尽一切努力 采取一切行动来阻止冲突再次发生

translation.en: to prevent another conflict.
translation.zh: 我国人民的心理安康会有问题

translation.en: 'Cause of one thing, I'm certain.
translation.zh: 因为有一件事我很确定

translation.en: If it comes,
the next war will be infinitely worse than the last.
translation.zh: 下一次战争将比上一次更可怕

translation.en: And they will need even greater fortitude to survive it.
translation.zh: 人民需要更大的毅力才能熬过去

translation.en: -Neville. -No.
Oh, it's all right. It's all right.
[kisses] Come on. Let's go in.
This is Joan, Mr. Legat. She's our fastest.
translation.zh: 这位是琼 勒加特先生她是速度最快的打字员

translation.en: Joan, stop what you're doing now.
translation.zh: 琼 把手上的活儿停一下

translation.en: Mr. Legat needs you to type up the PM's speech for the House.
translation.zh: 勒加特先生需要你把首相的下议院演说稿打出来

translation.en: -Of course. -Thank you.
-Thank you for doing this so quickly. -You're most welcome.
If you could make four copies, please.
These notes in red, these amendments, if you can put them in where they are.
translation.zh: 这些红色的备注和修改保持原位就行

translation.en: Absolutely, thank you.
Uh, could you, um… stand a little further away, please?
Right, sorry.
Sorry, Miss, um…
Joan will be sufficient.
And if you want to know where I'm from…
translation.zh: 如果你想知道我来自哪里…

translation.en: -[Hugh] I-- -…the answer is Nottingham.
-[knocking at door] -Yes?
-Sorry for my delay, sir. -Ah! Legat, good, good.
translation.zh: 抱歉我耽搁了 先生 勒加特 来得正好

translation.en: Now, we can't risk losing the connection to Berlin.
translation.zh: 我们必须跟柏林保持密切联络

translation.en: Syers has the line to Rome, so I want you to sit here…
translation.zh: 塞耶斯守着来自罗马的电话我希望你坐在这里

translation.en: Bring that chair over.
…and keep the line open and listen out for news.
translation.zh: 保持线路畅通仔细听 别错过任何消息

translation.en: -Do you think you can manage that? -Of course, sir.
translation.zh: -你觉得你可以做到吗？-是的 长官

translation.en: What exactly am I listening for?
To see whether Mussolini's intervened.
The PM needs to know before he addresses the House.
translation.zh: 在发表下议院演说前 首相需要知情

translation.en: Things are getting tight.
-Yes. That is painfully obvious. -[door opens]
translation.zh: 是啊 很明显 真令人不爽

translation.en: -Anything? -Not yet.
What…
-I'm afraid we do need to leave now, sir. -Yes.
translation.zh: -恐怕现在得离开了 长官-好

translation.en: -You address the House in ten minutes. -Yes, I know.
translation.zh: 您将于10分钟后在下议院演说

translation.en: -Nothing? -Nothing, sir.
-The line's open? -The line's open. No reply.
-Sir. -Yes.
Yes, all right!
If news comes once the PM is speaking, Legat,
translation.zh: 勒加特 如果首相演说时有消息传来

translation.en: -bring it to the chamber immediately. -Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 请马上通知 好 长官

translation.en: -Is Anne here? -She's gone on ahead.
She'll be in the gallery, as will I.
translation.zh: 她会坐在旁听席 我也是

translation.en: -Your hat, sir. -Thank you so much.
translation.zh: -您的帽子 先生-非常感谢

translation.en: -God bless you, Mr. Chamberlain! -[man] Mr. Chamberlain!
translation.zh: -上帝保佑您 张伯伦先生！-张伯伦先生！

translation.en: Good luck, sir.
We're all behind you. God bless you.
translation.zh: 我们都支持您 上帝保佑您

translation.en: -Hello? -[man] This is the ambassador.
Mr. Henderson, this is Hugh Legat, the prime minister's private secretary.
translation.zh: 韩德森先生 我是休勒加特首相的私人秘书

translation.en: I just returned from Herr Hitler. Where's the PM?
translation.zh: 我刚从希特勒先生那里回来首相呢？

translation.en: [Chamberlain] For His Majesty's Government,
translation.zh: 对于英王陛下的政府来说

translation.en: there were three alternative courses
that might have been adopted.
Either we could have threatened to go to war with Germany
translation.zh: 我们可以威胁 如果德国侵捷

translation.en: if it attacked Czechoslovakia,
or we could have stood aside and allowed matters to take their course.
translation.zh: 抑或我们可以袖手旁观任由事态发展

translation.en: Or finally, we could attempt
translation.zh: 抑或最后一个替代方案我们也可以试图

translation.en: a peaceful settlement by way of mediation.
translation.zh: 通过调解来达成和平解决

translation.en: [MPs] Hear, hear.
I know very well that I have opened myself to criticism
translation.zh: 我很清楚 我敞开心扉接受批评

translation.en: -on the grounds that I was detracting… -It's a message from Berlin.
translation.zh: -理由是我有损…-柏林传来的消息

translation.en: [Chamberlain] …from the dignity of a British prime minister,
and to disappointment
and perhaps even resentment…
-[murmuring] …if I failed to deliver a satisfactory agreement.
translation.zh: 令人满意的协议甚至可能让怨恨声四起

translation.en: I am…
able to report to the House
that I have just received news from Berlin
translation.zh: 我刚获悉来自柏林的消息

translation.en: that Herr Hitler
has postponed mobilisation.
Furthermore,
-he has invited me… -[man] Very well done, Prime Minister!
…along with Signor Mussolini
and the prime minister of France, Monsieur Daladier,
translation.zh: 和法国总理达拉第先生

translation.en: -to meet him in Munich tomorrow… -[knocking at door]
translation.zh: 明天在慕尼黑与他会面

translation.en: …to resolve the Sudetenland issue.
translation.zh: 以解决苏台德地区这一问题

translation.en: [in German] Gentlemen.
-Is it starting? -[sighs]
Mussolini talked Hitler into a conference with Chamberlain and Daladier.
translation.zh: 墨索里尼说服希特勒明天在慕尼黑

translation.en: Tomorrow in Munich.
translation.zh: 与张伯伦和达拉第会晤

translation.en: They're going to sacrifice the Sudetenland to prevent war.
translation.zh: 他们要牺牲苏台德地区来阻止战争

translation.en: -Damn it! -They're doing exactly what he wants.
-Will the Wehrmacht move against him? -We can forget about that.
-Not a chance. -So this is it?
-God damn it! -Honestly, please.
Pardon me.
What do the gentlemen plan on doing?
It's as good as decided. A conference like this is a formality.
translation.zh: 事情已经板上钉钉了这种会议只是走走过场而已

translation.en: You need to find a way to meet Chamberlain.
translation.zh: 你们必须想办法跟张伯伦见面

translation.en: You have to prevent this agreement from being made.
translation.zh: 你们必须阻止他们达成这份协议

translation.en: Thank God you can still laugh.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地 你还笑得出来

translation.en: Show him the proof.
-What proof? -That Hitler is bent on a war of conquest.
translation.zh: -什么证据？-希特勒决心要发动一场征服之战

translation.en: I am in possession of a document.
What kind of document?
[Paul] Trust me, please.
-Paul. -Can I just…
Just a moment…
Hugh Legat is one of Chamberlain's secretaries.
translation.zh: 休勒加特是张伯伦的秘书之一

translation.en: Can you arrange for him to come to Munich? That he's part of the English delegation?
translation.zh: 你能安排他到慕尼黑来吗？他是英国代表团的一员？

translation.en: Possibly, yes.
-Will he be expecting-- -No.
But he will help us.
All right.
Right, I'll do what I can.
Gentlemen.
And can you get Paul into the conference?
translation.zh: 你能让保罗参加会议吗？

translation.en: I'll try and add you as an interpreter.
translation.zh: 我会让你以口译员的身份加入

translation.en: I have to get back.
What's happening here?
Do you think you can smuggle illegal documents
translation.zh: 你认为可以把非法文件

translation.en: into an international conference
and have a secret meeting with the British prime minister,
translation.zh: 然后在元首的眼皮底下

translation.en: right under the Führer's nose?
-Yes. -[laughs]
Oh, Paul?
Then you should have this with you.
Ever used one?
-As children, we used to shoot rabbits. -[both laugh]
translation.zh: 小时候 我们经常去打兔子

translation.en: This is different.
The principle's the same, right?
Thanks.
[in English] Sir Alexander? I got a message you wanted to see me.
translation.zh: 亚历山大爵士？我听说您想见我

translation.en: [Cadogan] Ah, Legat. Yes.
translation.zh: 啊 勒加特 是的

translation.en: Close the door.
What's this about, sir?
[Cadogan] This is Colonel Menzies from MI6.
translation.zh: 这位是军情六处的明格斯上校

translation.en: -Colonel? -Good evening.
I believe the name Paul von Hartmann is known to you?
translation.zh: 你对保罗冯哈特曼这个名字很熟悉吧？

translation.en: [Cadogan] Legat?
Yes.
Yes, sir. We were at Oxford together.
translation.zh: 是的 长官 我们是牛津的同学

translation.en: When did you last see him?
translation.zh: 你上次见他是什么时候？

translation.en: Uh, the summer of '32. I visited him in Munich.
translation.zh: 1932年的夏天 我去慕尼黑探望过他

translation.en: All roads lead to Munich.
-Any contact since? -No.
-Why not? -We had a disagreement.
translation.zh: -为何不联系？-我们俩意见不合

translation.en: -What about? -Politics.
And you haven't communicated since?
translation.zh: 后来你就没跟他交流过？

translation.en: No, sir.
We're sorry about the questions, Legat,
translation.zh: 很抱歉要问你这些问题 勒加特

translation.en: but we need to understand what sort of relationship you have,
translation.zh: 但我们需要了解你跟这个德国人

translation.en: or had, with this particular German.
translation.zh: 是何种关系 或者之前是何种关系

translation.en: It seems your friend is part of the secret opposition to Hitler.
translation.zh: 貌似你的朋友是反希特勒的秘密团体成员

translation.en: His position inside the Foreign Ministry gives him access to classified material.
translation.zh: 他可以利用在外交部的职务之便接触到机密资料

translation.en: Material he's willing to share with us.
translation.zh: 他愿意与我们分享这些材料

translation.en: Or, more specifically, with you.
translation.zh: 或者更确切地说 是与你分享

translation.en: How do you feel about that?
Surprised.
[Cadogan] But…
are you willing to take matters further?
I don't understand.
He has a document in his possession,
and we'd very much like to know what it is.
translation.zh: 我们很想知道是什么内容

translation.en: We'd like you to go to Munich tomorrow,
translation.zh: 我们希望你明天前往慕尼黑

translation.en: meet with von Hartmann, and get the document.
translation.zh: 跟冯哈特曼见面 拿到那份文件

translation.en: I beg your pardon?
It's not without risk.
Technically, it'll be an act of espionage on foreign soil.
translation.zh: 严格来说这是要去外国领土上开展间谍活动

translation.en: This kind of thing, sir, I--
translation.zh: 这种事 先生 我不是很…

translation.en: -I'm not really-- -No one is at first, but you'll do fine.
translation.zh: 这种事 先生 我不是很… 没人一开始就能做好 但你没问题的

translation.en: Duty calls, Legat.
-I'm not sure how Cleverly will feel-- -[Cadogan] Leave Cleverly to us.
translation.zh: -我不确定克莱弗利会作何感想…-克莱弗利就交给我们处理

translation.en: Absolutely. We know Oscar.
translation.zh: 没问题的 我们了解奥斯卡

translation.en: And the PM doesn't need to know.
Well.
Good luck, Legat.
[man] The German Reich! Vote for the German Reich!
translation.zh: 德意志国！投给德意志国！

translation.en: Which government is in the right? The answer is…
translation.zh: 哪个政府是正确之选？答案是…

translation.en: Cast your pivotal vote!
[in English] I was recommended a bar called "Hubers."
translation.zh: -有人向我推荐“胡巴斯”酒吧-对 我们知道

translation.en: -Yeah, we know it. -Yeah, we know it.
translation.zh: -有人向我推荐“胡巴斯”酒吧-对 我们知道 -对 我们知道-什么？

translation.en: -What? -We know Hubers.
-Great! -Not great.
translation.zh: -我们知道胡巴斯-太好了！ 不怎么样

translation.en: -[man shouting in German] -[in English] Yes, great. Ah!
The beer's cheap, and apparently, they have live music.
translation.zh: 啤酒便宜 而且有现场音乐

translation.en: Believe me, the music there is awful.
translation.zh: 相信我 那里的音乐很糟糕

translation.en: Awful music is my favourite kind of music.
-Mine too. Paul. -Yeah. See?
[in German] It's his vacation. He's the guest.
translation.zh: 他在休假 他是客人

translation.en: [in English] Hugh gets to choose.
translation.zh: 去哪喝酒 休说了算

translation.en: -Hubers. -Hubers.
[in German] Thirsty!
[Hugh, in English] You can go there. There is one. He took coffee there.
translation.zh: 可以去那里 那边显然有一家他去那里喝过咖啡

translation.en: It's on my little list, which you all made fun of.
translation.zh: 我的个人清单上有这一家你们都因此取笑过我了

translation.en: I don't want to go to this-- this rally.
Yeah, but I want to go to the rally.
translation.zh: 好吧 但我想参加集会

translation.en: -[in German] You're not going there. -Pardon?
-You're too drunk, Lena. -I see. I'm too drunk.
translation.zh: 你喝醉了 莉娜 我明白了 我烂醉如泥

translation.en: -I'm going. -Well, I won't come. Not with you two.
translation.zh: 我就要去 我不去 不跟你们俩去

translation.en: Okay, then don't.
-[in English] Hugh will come. -[sighs]
Do I have to go?
You have to actually see the man.
translation.zh: 你必须亲眼见到那个人

translation.en: If he's so ridiculous, why not just ignore him?
translation.zh: 如果他这么可笑 无视他不就行了？

translation.en: Ignore him? We cannot ignore him. He's dangerous!
translation.zh: 无视？我们不能无视他 他很危险！

translation.en: -No, but this is fuelling the fire, Lena. -He's--
translation.zh: 不 但这是火上浇油 正合他意 他就是想博关注

translation.en: -This is what he wants. Attention. -He's talking about things that matter!
translation.zh: 正合他意 他就是想博关注 他说的都是重要的事！

translation.en: -Oh, come on, Paul. -There's a reason people attend rallies.
translation.zh: 人们参加这些集会是有原因的

translation.en: -Paul, he's a bigot and a pervert. -Exactly.
translation.zh: -保罗 他是偏执狂兼变态狂-没错

translation.en: The people of a whole country forgot about what makes them as a nation,
translation.zh: 全国人民都忘记了是什么造就了这个国家

translation.en: and now that there is someone to lead them
and to remind them of their nation's greatness--
translation.zh: 提醒他们这个国家有多伟大…

translation.en: I don't understand how anyone can vote for this man.
translation.zh: 我不明白怎么会有人给这个人投票

translation.en: Voting for Hitler is not voting against Jews.
translation.zh: 给希特勒投票不代表投票反对犹太人

translation.en: -Not against Jews? -It's voting-- No!
-It's voting for the future. -The future?
-[Lena] For the future? -Yes! Yes!
-What future? -I'll show you!
translation.zh: 什么未来？ 我给你们看！

translation.en: [in German] You lot, hey! Can I ask you something?
translation.zh: 几位 嘿！能问你们件事吗？

translation.en: -What? -What do you want?
-Who are you going to vote for? -Why?
translation.zh: -你们会投给谁？-为什么问这个？

translation.en: What do you think of Hitler?
translation.zh: 你们怎么看待希特勒的？

translation.en: Hitler makes us proud to be German again!
translation.zh: 希特勒让我们再度为身为德国人而感到骄傲！

translation.en: -Thank you! Thank you very much. -Who are you lot going to vote for?
translation.zh: -谢谢！非常感谢-你们打算投给谁？

translation.en: -[man] Hitler! -Thank you.
[in English] See? The future.
[all cheering] Yes!
[in English] Now, Paul, you have to be careful, because people are scared.
translation.zh: 保罗 你得小心点 因为大家都很害怕

translation.en: Yes, scared of change.
[in German] Paul, people are leaving the country.
translation.zh: 保罗 人们在逃离这个国家

translation.en: Families are getting on boats to America.
translation.zh: 许多家庭正乘船逃往美国

translation.en: If that's what they decide, they are free to do so.
translation.zh: 如果他们决定要走 可以自由离开

translation.en: -They don't just decide like that! -Bullshit!
translation.zh: -这不是轻易做出的决定！-胡说！

translation.en: People don't want to live here any more.
translation.zh: 人们不想继续在这里生活了

translation.en: They are scared to live in this country. That's not just bullshit!
translation.zh: 他们害怕在这个国家生活这可不是胡扯！

translation.en: [in English] The Germany you're speaking of is being built upon the suffering of other people.
translation.zh: 你口中的德国建立在他人的痛苦之上

translation.en: You're one to talk about exploiting others,
translation.zh: 你还敢说剥削别人这种话 英国佬

translation.en: -Englishman. -Oh, all right.
translation.zh: 你还敢说剥削别人这种话 英国佬 好吧

translation.en: I take it. I'm a hypocrite. But I know fanaticism when I see it.
translation.zh: 我接受 我是个伪君子但我还分辨得出狂热主义

translation.en: [in German] Fa-na-ti-cal.
[in English] You think I'm a fanatic?
I think he's a fanatic,
translation.zh: 我认为他是狂热分子 而你在维护他

translation.en: -and you are defending him. -You sound like him.
translation.zh: 我认为他是狂热分子 而你在维护他 -你的语气都像他-去死吧！

translation.en: [in German] Fuck you!
-[in English] Hey! -What? You want to say something to me?
-I don't like you speaking like that. -I don't like you talking as if you knew
translation.zh: 我不喜欢你那样讲话 我不喜欢你说得好像懂得这种感觉一样！

translation.en: -what any of this feels like! -I don't think you understand
translation.zh: 我不喜欢你说得好像懂得这种感觉一样！ 我觉得你并不了解这种感觉…

translation.en: -this feeling you're-- -No, no, no.
translation.zh: 我觉得你并不了解这种感觉…

translation.en: You don't understand anything about me or about Germany!
translation.zh: 不！你根本不懂我 也不懂德国！

translation.en: -[speaking German] -You never for a second ever forget your triumph!
translation.zh: 你从来不会忘记你们的胜利！

translation.en: -[man 1, in German] Be quiet! -[man 2] Exactly!
You're talking down to me like a child. I'm supposed to be grateful for that?
translation.zh: 你居高临下 当我是小孩我该感恩戴德吗？

translation.en: I'm sick of being grateful! And I'm sick of you too.
translation.zh: 我受够了感恩！我也受够了你

translation.en: Pau--
-[clears throat] -[in English] I'm-- I'm so sorry.
You don't have to be sorry.
[sighs] I don't-- I don't understand this.
We always used to enjoy provoking each other. It--
translation.zh: 我们过去一向喜欢挑衅对方

translation.en: It was fun, but this is-- this is different. I've not seen him like that.
translation.zh: 很好玩 但这不一样 我从未见过他这副模样

translation.en: [sniffling] Me neither.
[sobs] I mean…
Shall we…
see some bigots and perverts?
translation.zh: 去看看一些偏执狂和变态狂？

translation.en: Yes.
-Heil Hitler. -Heil Hitler.
-[in German] Well? -Here are your papers.
They barely got you on the list.
translation.zh: 他们才刚把你加入名单

translation.en: Ready?
Are you coming?
Someone needs to make sure you don't do anything stupid.
translation.zh: 总得有人确保你不做傻事

translation.en: Go, hurry. See you in Munich.
translation.zh: 去吧 快去 慕尼黑再见

translation.en: EMIGRATE! GO TO JERUSALEM!
This is your compartment.
Thank you.
-[man 1] Cramped but cosy, huh? -[man 2] Yeah!
translation.zh: -有点挤但很温馨 对吧？-对！

translation.en: [man 1] Helmut, no visits from women.
translation.zh: 赫尔穆特 禁止女人来访

translation.en: [Helmut] Of course, you know me.
[man 1] This is me.
-There's someone in there already. Hello? -[Paul] Yes.
translation.zh: -已经有人在里面了 喂？-来了

translation.en: Paulie?
Hello, Franz.
What are you doing here?
It seems they need my help…
-I see. -…with interpreting.
-No one told me. -Yes, it was a last-minute decision.
translation.zh: -没人跟我说过-对 临时决定的

translation.en: -Is this your bunk? -Yes.
Then we're roommates.
Yeah.
Like in the old days.
-Like in the old days! -Yeah, excellent!
-Excellent, right? -Excellent.
Great.
-Okay, may I? One second. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 好 我可以拉开帘子吗？稍等 好

translation.en: -See you in a bit, I… -See you.
Thank you, Legat.
[man] Prime Minister, don't let us go to war again.
translation.zh: 首相 不要让我们再打仗了

translation.en: -[man] Good luck, sir. -Nice of you. I'll make sure we don't.
translation.zh: 你真好心 我会确保这一点

translation.en: -[woman] Sir, you can really do this. -Good morning.
translation.zh: -长官 您一定可以做到的-早上好

translation.en: -We should board, Prime Minister. -Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 我们马上就该登机了 首相

translation.en: -Give us a statement! -[Wilson] Prime Minister?
Sir?
Prime Minister, please.
-Thank you. -Thank you. That's enough.
-[Chamberlain] I'm going to say a word. -[Wilson] We should board now, sir.
translation.zh: -霍勒斯 让我说句话-我们该登机了 长官

translation.en: [clears throat] When I was a boy,
I used to repeat,
"If at first you don't succeed,
try, try, try again."
translation.zh: 就一而再 再而三地尝试”

translation.en: And that's what I'm doing now.
translation.zh: 我现在做就是这样做的

translation.en: -[cheering] -[man] Good luck, Mr. Chamberlain!
translation.zh: 祝您好运 张伯伦先生

translation.en: -[in German] You caught me. -Can I assist you?
translation.zh: 被你抓到了 要我帮忙吗？

translation.en: I know it looks bad, but it's nothing personal.
translation.zh: 我知道这看起来很尴尬但并非针对个人

translation.en: We all have our orders.
I'm relieved to be able to tell you that everything is in order.
translation.zh: 能告诉你一切妥当 我就放心了

translation.en: You can put it back now.
Thank you so much.
Come on, Paulie. Are you cross now?
translation.zh: 别这样 小保罗 你生气了吗？

translation.en: Do I hear you being cross now? Is Paulie cross?
translation.zh: 你现在是生气了吗？小保罗生气了？

translation.en: Cross little Paulie!
Paulie, come on!
Defend yourself!
Come on, defend yourself!
-Von Hartmann? -I am.
Dr. Schmidt. Head of translation. Do you have a moment?
translation.zh: 我是施密特博士 翻译组长能占用你一点时间吗？

translation.en: -Of course. -I'm very pleased to meet you.
I'm relieved I don't have to do all of it by myself.
translation.zh: 我可算松了口气不用一个人做这么多事

translation.en: When we arrive in Munich, I will handle the Führer, the Duce,
translation.zh: 到达慕尼黑后 我负责元首、领袖

translation.en: the Prime Minister, and the Président du Conseil.
translation.zh: 首相和部长会议主席的翻译工作

translation.en: And you can deal with the smaller stuff.
What other languages do you speak?
[in each language] French, Italian, and a little, really just a little bit of Ru…
translation.zh: 法语、意大利语 还会一点点俄…

translation.en: [in German] The Russians aren't invited, and neither are the Czechs.
translation.zh: 这次没请俄国人 也没请捷克人

translation.en: Don't worry. I'll brief you on the details later.
translation.zh: 别担心 回头我再跟你说细节

translation.en: Right now, the Führer is waiting for his foreign press summary.
translation.zh: 现在元首正等着要他的外媒新闻摘要

translation.en: Can you take care of that?
-Right now? -Yes, right now.
What do I have to do?
Look him in the eye.
Don't speak unless you're spoken to directly.
translation.zh: 除非他直接跟你说话 否则不要开口

translation.en: And don't smell of smoke.
If you stink of smoke, he'll throw you out.
translation.zh: 如果你身上有烟味 他会把你赶走

translation.en: -Heil Hitler. -Heil Hitler.
Von Hartmann, press summary for the Führer.
translation.zh: 冯哈特曼 送新闻摘要给元首

translation.en: Who wrote this?
That's the editorial in the London Times, my Führer.
translation.zh: 那是《泰晤士报》的社论 元首

translation.en: Have you spent time in England?
I was at Oxford for two years.
I can hear that.
Von Hartmann.
You're ambitious. Good.
You're intelligent. Good.
Maybe you think you're more intelligent than me?
translation.zh: 或许你觉得自己比我聪明？

translation.en: -I-- -I can read people.
The way professors at those universities read books.
translation.zh: 就像大学教授读书一样

translation.en: Oxford.
I see who you are.
translation.zh: 我看得出来你是什么人

translation.en: Do you see me?
Yes, my Führer.
You know the English. What are they thinking?
translation.zh: 你懂英语 他们在想什么？

translation.en: They underestimate you.
Correct.
The maps, my Führer.
The new course for the border.
We have 40 divisions to destroy the Czechs with.
translation.zh: 我们有40个师可以摧毁捷克人

translation.en: We could have it done within a week.
translation.zh: 一周之内 我们就能攻下来

translation.en: Yes, my Führer.
The train is heading in the wrong direction.
Why these detours?
Good, thank you.
PEACE IN EUROPE
WELCOME CHAMBERLAIN
-[in French] How was your flight? -Oh! It was very uncomfortable.
translation.zh: 航程还顺利吗？ 很不舒服

translation.en: I have a very sore back.
-[Chamberlain, in English] Look at this. -Would you care for something to drink?
[Chamberlain] Ah… Yes. A little, ah… whisky and water.
translation.zh: 好 来点威士忌加水吧

translation.en: [man, in German] Welcome.
-[in English] A great pleasure. -[man] Our friend Hermann Göring.
translation.zh: -早上好 幸会-我们的朋友赫尔曼戈林

translation.en: [in German] Hello.
Welcome. Pardon me.
[in English] Good morning.
-[in German] Welcome. -Hello.
Attention!
We'll talk upstairs. Tell him that.
translation.zh: 我们到楼上谈吧 跟他说

translation.en: Just the four of us. You and one advisor each.
translation.zh: 就我们四人 你和每人一名顾问

translation.en: Yes, my Führer.
Thank you.
[man 1] …saw him carry himself with confidence.
-[man 2] Indeed. -I'll go give him the rest.
translation.zh: -…看他一脸的自信-确实 我去把剩余的给他

translation.en: I require a watch. Lend me yours, please.
translation.zh: 我需要一块手表 请把你的借给我

translation.en: He apparently thinks he won't get it back. He thinks the Führer is a watch thief.
translation.zh: 他显然觉得要不回去了他以为元首是个偷表贼

translation.en: He thinks he's one of the clever ones.
translation.zh: 他觉得自己是个聪明人

translation.en: Well, let's get it over with.
[Schmidt] Very well, sir.
[in English] Rather too strong, this. I need to-- Ah.
[Schmidt] Excuse me, Your Excellencies.
translation.zh: 打扰一下 各位阁下

translation.en: Prime Minister, Monsieur le Président du Conseil.
The Führer invites you to join him in the library…
translation.zh: 元首邀请两位同他一起前往图书馆

translation.en: -Very good. Come along. -…in order to begin the talks.
translation.zh: 以便开始会谈 来吧

translation.en: He suggests leaders and one advisor only.
translation.zh: 他建议各位首脑只带一名顾问前往

translation.en: Well. Sorry, Henderson. Horace, looks it better be you.
translation.zh: 抱歉 韩德森霍勒斯 看来你是最佳人选了

translation.en: [in German] Well, please excuse me a moment.
It was a mistake not to insist on the Czechs being in the negotiations.
translation.zh: 未坚持让捷克参加谈判是个错误

translation.en: They're carving up the damn country, and there's no one--
translation.zh: 他们要瓜分这个该死的国家没有一个人…

translation.en: Please try to stop fidgeting, Mr. Legat. You'll wear that chair down to a splinter.
translation.zh: 请不要坐立不安的 勒加特先生你会把那把椅子坐散架的

translation.en: -Hello. -Yes, this is Cleverly.
-Sir, it's Legat. -Yes. Where's the PM?
translation.zh: -长官 我是勒加特-好 首相呢？

translation.en: Everyone's been at the conference for about an hour now, sir.
translation.zh: 大家都在会谈中 大概一小时了 先生

translation.en: Good, good, good.
Sir Horace asked me to stay here, but I feel I'd be more--
translation.zh: 霍勒斯爵士让我留在这里 但我宁愿…

translation.en: Make sure this line remains open.
With respect, I feel I'd be more useful to the PM if I was at the conference.
translation.zh: 恕我直言 我觉得若是让我参会对总理会更有帮助

translation.en: Just do your job, Legat.
translation.zh: 做好本职工作 勒加特

translation.en: But having come all of this way--
Absolutely not!
You stay exactly where you are.
Hello? Sir? Sir?
-[click] -Hello?
If London calls again,
I can always tell them you're busy with the hotel manager.
translation.zh: 我可以告诉他们你忙着应付酒店经理

translation.en: They'll believe that, I'm sure.
translation.zh: 他们会信的 我确定

translation.en: Go.
-[in German] Oh, sorry! -Watch it!
Your ID, please.
Excuse me. Sir Neville?
-Yes. -I'm Hugh Legat.
Ah, Legat. Yes, of course. What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 勒加特 对 是你 你来这个干嘛？

translation.en: I had a couple of queries from London.
translation.zh: 伦敦方面有几个问题要我来问

translation.en: Is Sir Horace in?
No. No, he's with the PM and the other leaders.
translation.zh: 不在 他和首相及其他首脑在一起

translation.en: Is there anything you can tell me?
translation.zh: 你有什么事可以跟我说吗？

translation.en: [sighs] Nothing pressing.
[in German] Hartmann, have you noticed how often Göring changed outfits today?
translation.zh: 哈特曼 你注意到戈林今天换衣服的频率有多高吗？

translation.en: This is the third uniform I've seen him wear today.
translation.zh: 这是今天我看到他穿的第三套制服了

translation.en: But don't let that-- Oh, there's Schmidt. He needs you.
translation.zh: 但别…施密特在那边 他需要你

translation.en: The Führer wishes for the ambassadors to join now.
translation.zh: 元首现在希望各国大使加入

translation.en: Fetch François-Poncet and Henderson. Quickly, please.
translation.zh: 快去把弗朗索瓦-庞赛和韩德森请来

translation.en: -[in English] How's it going? -Haven't a clue.
[in French] Mr. Ambassador.
-[in English] Would you like some tea? -Thank you.
Tea, if you'd be so kind.
[woman, in German] Right away.
[in English] Your Excellency, would you be so good as to join the leaders in the library?
translation.zh: 阁下 请您到图书馆加入首脑们的谈话好吗？

translation.en: At last.
[in German] I… Follow me without anyone seeing.
translation.zh: 我…跟我来 别让任何人发现

translation.en: [in English] Where the hell are you going?
-Do you happen to have the time? -No. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -你好 你现在有时间吗？-没有 抱歉

translation.en: Thanks anyway.
[in English] Damn it.
-[in English] Were you followed? -I don't know.
I'm not used to this sort of thing.
Welcome to the New Germany, Hugh.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到新德国 休

translation.en: Are we safe?
As safe as anywhere.
It's fine. I'll order beers. We'll drink them.
translation.zh: 没事 我点啤酒 我们一起喝

translation.en: We'll listen to the music and speak entirely in German.
translation.zh: 我们听音乐 完全用德语交谈

translation.en: [in German] Excuse me. Some beer? Two pale lagers.
translation.zh: 打扰一下 来点啤酒？两杯拉格啤酒

translation.en: You're married?
Yes.
Happily?
So-so.
What about you?
No.
You're turning grey.
And you still don't need to shave.
Where's Lena?
We don't speak any more.
My pleasure. Cheers.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 干杯

translation.en: Hugh, we both, you and I,
translation.zh: 休 我们俩 你和我

translation.en: are the last hope of stopping Hitler.
translation.zh: 是阻止希特勒的最后希望

translation.en: They're going to make a deal. Tomorrow or the day after.
translation.zh: 他们明天或后天就会达成协议

translation.en: I know. That's the problem.
translation.zh: 我知道 这就是问题所在

translation.en: Why?
Make your deal, and Hitler becomes even more powerful.
translation.zh: 一旦达成协议 希特勒会更加强大

translation.en: We're preventing a war.
No, you're not. You're not!
translation.zh: 不 不行 你阻止不了！

translation.en: I know it's awful for the Czechs to lose these territories,
translation.zh: 我知道对捷克人来说丧失这些领土是很可怕的事

translation.en: but if you invade tomorrow,
translation.zh: 但如果你们明天就侵捷

translation.en: tens of thousands of innocent people will die.
translation.zh: 成千上万的无辜之人将死去

translation.en: Yes. And if we don't invade tomorrow, then soon maybe millions will die.
translation.zh: 对 如果我们明天不入侵很快会有数百万人死去

translation.en: Millions.
You have no idea who he is.
translation.zh: 你根本不了解他的本性

translation.en: If you did, none of you would be here.
translation.zh: 如果知道 你就不会来这里

translation.en: What do you want from me?
A meeting with Chamberlain.
Tonight.
Help me. Hugh. You're his secretary. Secretaries arrange meetings.
translation.zh: 帮帮我 休 你是他的秘书秘书负责安排会面

translation.en: -But not secret meetings with you. -There has to be a way.
translation.zh: -但不能安排跟你秘密会面-肯定有办法的

translation.en: It's impossible. And what do you want to tell him?
translation.zh: 不可能 你想跟他说什么？

translation.en: What do you want to tell him?
[in English] That Hitler is a terrible man?
translation.zh: 说希特勒是个可怕的人？

translation.en: [in German] Trust me, he knows.
[whispers] I can prove it.
Is that amusing to you?
I'd forgotten what you're like.
translation.zh: 我都忘了你是什么人了

translation.en: -You don't want to help me. -I can't. I can't.
I can't! Not with a private meeting.
translation.zh: 帮不了！不可能安排私下会谈

translation.en: But if you have information we should know about,
translation.zh: 但如果你掌握我们应该了解的情报

translation.en: I can try to arrange for the prime minister to see it.
translation.zh: 我可以尽力安排让首相看一眼

translation.en: Before he signs anything?
I can try.
Yes.
Excuse me, sir.
If you're done with the Stürmer, could I have it?
translation.zh: 你看完那份《冲锋报》的话能给我看看吗？

translation.en: -Of course. -[Paul] Yeah? And could I keep it as well?
-Of course. -Are you sure?
-Yes. -Thank you very much.
[in English] Don't look at it. Just put it under your arm, God damn it.
translation.zh: 别看 放到你胳膊下 真该死

translation.en: -Right. Sorry. -You make a terrible spy, Hugh.
translation.zh: -对 抱歉-你这个间谍当得真差劲 休

translation.en: -Sorry. -You should be at home with your wife.
translation.zh: -抱歉-你就该好好在家陪老婆

translation.en: It's actually a relief to be away.
translation.zh: 其实离开家也是一种解脱

translation.en: Let me guess. She finds you distant.
translation.zh: 我来猜猜 她觉得你很冷漠

translation.en: She says you don't let her in.
translation.zh: 她说你不让她走进你心里

translation.en: That's right.
Do something about that.
And finish your beer.
Will I see you again?
You know,
if you ever needed to get out, you'd be well looked after in London.
translation.zh: 如果你需要离开去伦敦会得到很好的照顾

translation.en: I'll never abandon Germany. Never.
translation.zh: 我永远不会背弃德国 永远不会

translation.en: [Hugh] Top secret.
Berlin, 10th November 1937.
The Führer began by explaining that the question is one of space.
translation.zh: 一开始 元首解释这是空间的问题

translation.en: The German race comprises over 85 million,
translation.zh: 德意志民族有八千五百万人口

translation.en: and this constitutes a more tightly-packed racial community than any other country.
translation.zh: 使得这里的种族社群密度高于其他任何国家

translation.en: The only remedy lies in the acquisition of living space.
translation.zh: 唯一的补救办法就是获得生存空间

translation.en: And this will only be solved by means of force.
translation.zh: 只有通过武力才能解决这个问题

translation.en: [in German] How's your afternoon, Herr von Hartmann?
translation.zh: 今天下午过得怎么样冯哈特曼先生？

translation.en: Arduous, Frau Winter. And yours?
translation.zh: 很辛苦 温特夫人 你呢？

translation.en: Well, I'm hanging in there.
-Did you meet with your English friend? -I did.
translation.zh: -你跟你的英国朋友见上面了吗？-是的

translation.en: -And? -And we'll see.
Did something happen?
Yes, you could say that.
We have an agreement.
An agreement for the immediate handover of the Sudetenland…
translation.zh: 协议规定立即将苏台德地区移交给…

translation.en: [in Italian] Congratulations, Schmidt. Excellent work.
translation.zh: 恭喜 施密特 干得漂亮

translation.en: Thank you.
[in German] …to the German Empire.
We'll get everything we wanted.
I thought it would take at least another day.
translation.zh: 我以为至少还要一天才有结果

translation.en: Yes, it would have if Chamberlain had had his way.
translation.zh: 对 如果张伯伦按自己的方式行事 那确实

translation.en: He wanted to wear down the Führer with the smallest details.
translation.zh: 他想用细枝末节来消磨元首

translation.en: -The man is a bean counter. -Have they signed already?
translation.zh: -那家伙真是攻于算计-他们已经签了吗？

translation.en: What? The treaties are being drawn up right now. They'll sign after dinner.
translation.zh: 什么？条约正在起草中他们晚餐后就会签

translation.en: And straighten your tie.
The two of us have been invited to the dining room with the Führer.
translation.zh: 我们俩受邀陪同元首用餐

translation.en: -Oh, God. -What, "Oh, God"? Von Hartmann.
Herr von Hartmann, that's a great honour.
translation.zh: 冯哈特曼先生 这是莫大的荣幸

translation.en: -Yes. -Quite right, Fräulein…
-Frau Winter. -Frau Winter.
Anyway, the English and the French aren't staying for dinner.
translation.zh: 总之 英国人和法国人不会留下吃晚餐

translation.en: They've lost their appetite.
-So we were asked to fill the ranks. -[man] Dr. Schmidt!
translation.zh: -所以邀请我俩去填补空缺-施密特博士！

translation.en: Well, looks like I'm needed again.
-[in English] A narrow escape. -Thank you.
The Führer is vegetarian. Insists on meat not being served anywhere.
translation.zh: 元首吃素坚持任何地方都不供应肉类

translation.en: -Does he? -Yes.
When I was at lunch at the Chancellery with all the high command,
translation.zh: 我去总理府吃午餐时 所有高级指挥官都在场他们上的是芹菜排

translation.en: -they served Sellerieschnitzel. -[snorts]
translation.zh: 所有高级指挥官都在场他们上的是芹菜排

translation.en: -Musso will have enjoyed that. -Yes, wouldn't he just?
translation.zh: -墨索里尼肯定吃得很开心-对 可不是嘛

translation.en: And afterward, I'm telling you, I went to a butcher's shop nearby.
translation.zh: 我告诉你那之后 我去了附近一家肉店

translation.en: -Ordered two huge sausages. -Could be Wurst.
translation.zh: -点了两根香肠-有可能是德式香肠

translation.en: Yes. And I was just leaving the butcher's shop,
translation.zh: 对 我正要离开肉店时

translation.en: when who should be coming in but Hermann Göring,
translation.zh: 猜猜谁来了除了赫尔曼戈林 还会有谁呢？

translation.en: -with a hungry look on his face? -[laughing]
-He was as famished as I was. -Sir, I--
translation.zh: -他跟我一样 饥肠辘辘-先生 我…

translation.en: Yes, not now, Legat.
[in German] Don't drink too much, von Hartmann. Just wet your lips.
translation.zh: 别喝太多 冯哈特曼 润润嘴唇就行了

translation.en: We still have a lot of work ahead of us.
translation.zh: 我们还有很多工作要做

translation.en: Tomorrow, the world will watch Munich and our translations.
translation.zh: 明天全世界的目光都会盯着慕尼黑和我们的翻译

translation.en: Of course.
We can't afford any mistakes.
…he has some skill. He's not a bad negotiator.
translation.zh: …他有些本事 谈判技能也不差

translation.en: [Henderson, in English] Prime Minister, tomorrow morning,
millions of mothers will be blessing you
for having saved their sons from the horror of war.
translation.zh: 因为您让他们的儿子免受战争之苦

translation.en: Oh…
-Prime Minister. -[Chamberlain] Too kind.
-Can I have a word? -Not now.
-It's rather urgent. -Legat!
You really should go and rest before the signing, Neville.
translation.zh: 签约前你真该去休息一会儿 内维尔

translation.en: I think I will take forty winks.
-I sent a sandwich up to your room. -Thanks so much, Horace.
translation.zh: -我让人送了份三明治去你房间-多谢了 霍勒斯

translation.en: Legat. Will you just give the man a moment to breathe?
translation.zh: 勒加特 你能让他喘口气吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -He's very tired.
He's been up for 15 hours or more.
translation.zh: 他15个小时没合眼了 或者更久

translation.en: Yes, sir. Sorry.
translation.zh: 好的 长官 对不起

translation.en: Join us for supper.
All right.
-[in German] Excuse me. -Von Hartmann?
Where are you going?
Excuse me, my Führer. I'm needed for the translation of the agreement.
translation.zh: 抱歉 元首 协议的翻译工作需要我

translation.en: Come here.
I never forget a personal obligation.
For Germany,
I am prepared to be dishonest a thousand times over.
translation.zh: 我已做好准备 要做个撒谎高手

translation.en: For myself, never.
translation.zh: 为我自己 我永远不会撒谎

translation.en: I'm no watch thief.
Thank you, my Führer.
[Himmler] To the good health of our dear Italian friends.
translation.zh: 敬我们亲爱的意大利朋友祝愿他们身体健康

translation.en: And to the Führer.
[all] To the Führer.
[Wilson, in English] One of the Italian delegates was saying how good the kitchen is.
translation.zh: 一位意大利代表说这里的厨房很棒

translation.en: -[Henderson] Yes, indeed, yes. -[Wilson] What do you recommend?
translation.zh: 是的 没错 对 你有什么推荐的？

translation.en: -[Henderson] I recommend the Hachsen. -[Wilson] What is that?
[Henderson] It's a pork knuckle. Very crispy.
-Sir Horace! -Yes?
Would you mind if I joined you in a moment?
Yes, of course.
-Have you read it? -It's classified.
-If they find… -Have you spoken to Chamberlain?
translation.zh: -若是他们发现…-你跟张伯伦说了吗？

translation.en: -Have you spoken to Chamberlain? -Keep your voice down!
translation.zh: -若是他们发现…-你跟张伯伦说了吗？ 小声点！还没有

translation.en: -Thre's no linen. No linen. -[Hugh] Not yet.
You know they're about to sign?
translation.zh: 你知道他们要签约了吧？

translation.en: It isn't an easy thing to raise with him.
translation.zh: 听着 跟他提这事不容易

translation.en: -Then I'll do it. -Oh, for God's sake! Don't be stupid.
This is the last moment. Do you understand?
translation.zh: 这是最后时刻了 你明白吗？

translation.en: I won't have it on my conscience that I did nothing!
translation.zh: 我不想因为毫无作为而良心不安

translation.en: -I feel the same. As soon as I can-- -No, no.
translation.zh: 我有同感一有机会 我就会跟他说

translation.en: -I'll talk to him. -Not soon, now!
translation.zh: 我有同感一有机会 我就会跟他说 -现在就去 我们一起说-不行！

translation.en: -Let's do it together. -No!
translation.zh: -现在就去 我们一起说-不行！

translation.en: -Why not? We are on the edge. -Do you have any idea--
translation.zh: -为什么不行？刻不容缓-你知不知道…

translation.en: We are right on the edge.
translation.zh: 已经到了刻不容缓的时候

translation.en: Paul.
-I'm sorry. -What's happened to you?
We have to try, Hugh.
translation.zh: 我们必须努力一试 休

translation.en: Please, we have to try.
translation.zh: 拜托 我们必须努力一试

translation.en: This'll be the end of my career.
Where's the document?
In my room.
Come on.
[secretary] Is there another hotel nearby?
Downtown. I will call it. I will call.
Thank you, that would be great.
In the meantime, if we can get some linen so we can have a shower,
translation.zh: 在此期间 如果能送几条毛巾过来让我们洗个澡

translation.en: that would be amazing.
Listen.
He's old, and he's exhausted.
translation.zh: 他年纪大了 精疲力竭

translation.en: I'll give him the document, and if he agrees to see you,
translation.zh: 我会把文件给他 如果他答应见你

translation.en: for God's sake, don't give him a moral lecture.
translation.zh: 看在老天的份上别对他进行道德说教

translation.en: -Just the facts. -All right.
Wait here.
Oh, sorry, Prime Minister.
No, no, no, no. Come on in, Legat. Just having my blood pressure checked.
translation.zh: 没事 进来吧 勒加特 我刚测完血压

translation.en: Fortunately, it looks as if I'll live another day.
translation.zh: 幸运的是 看来我还能再活一天

translation.en: -Good night. -Good night, Joseph. Thank you.
translation.zh: -晚安-晚安 约瑟夫 谢谢

translation.en: So what is it that can't wait? Hm?
We've come into possession of a significant document.
translation.zh: 我们得到了一份重要文件

translation.en: And who is "we"?
I have come into possession of a document.
What is it?
The minutes of a meeting that Hitler held with his senior commanders last November.
translation.zh: 希特勒去年11月与其高级指挥官开会的会议记录

translation.en: A meeting in which he explicitly commits himself to a war of conquest.
translation.zh: 他在会上明确表示要发动一场征服之战

translation.en: Obviously, it's all in German,
translation.zh: 这显然是一份德文文件但我相信这是合法的

translation.en: but I believe it to be legitimate and truthful.
translation.zh: 这显然是一份德文文件但我相信这是合法的 而且属实

translation.en: And how did this document come to us?
translation.zh: 这份文件是怎么得来的？

translation.en: A friend gave it to me in strict confidence.
translation.zh: 一位朋友秘密交给我的

translation.en: -Friend? -A German diplomat.
Why does he wish us to have it?
translation.zh: 他为什么希望我们拿到这份文件？

translation.en: I think he should explain that himself. He's waiting outside.
translation.zh: 我觉得他应该自己解释他就在外面等着

translation.en: -Does Sir Horace know about this? -No, sir.
translation.zh: -霍勒斯爵士知道此事吗？-不知道 长官

translation.en: Nobody knows.
You're exceeding your authority, young man.
[scoffs] I can't possibly meet with a German diplomat.
translation.zh: 我不可能会见德国外交官

translation.en: I understand, but he is risking his life to see you.
translation.zh: 我明白但他是冒着生命危险来见您的

translation.en: No…
This is… most improper.
I'm aware, sir.
Right.
Three minutes. Not a moment longer.
translation.zh: 三分钟 一刻也不能多

translation.en: You've got three minutes.
This is Paul von Hartmann of the German Foreign Ministry.
translation.zh: 这位是德国外交部的保罗冯哈特曼

translation.en: -How do you do? -Thank you for seeing me.
I'm not sure it's very wise. For either of us.
translation.zh: 我不确定这样做对你我来说是否明智

translation.en: Take a seat. Close the door, Legat.
translation.zh: 坐吧 把门关上 勒加特

translation.en: You better come and join us, Legat. Come on.
translation.zh: 你也一起来 勒加特 过来

translation.en: So, get on with it.
That document is proof that Hitler is lying
translation.zh: 希特勒声称没有进一步的领土要求

translation.en: when he claims to have no further territorial demands.
translation.zh: 那份文件可以证明他撒谎

translation.en: On the contrary, he wants to expand the country,
translation.zh: 恰恰相反 他想扩张国土 他会继续扩张

translation.en: and he will keep on expanding.
translation.zh: 他想扩张国土 他会继续扩张

translation.en: Therefore, I beg you not to sign the agreement tonight.
translation.zh: 因此 我恳请您今晚不要签约

translation.en: [laughing] What?
Prime Minister.
Adolf Hitler is a monster.
translation.zh: 阿道夫希特勒是个魔鬼

translation.en: He is a madman.
You cannot give him what he wants. He'll take more and more land.
translation.zh: 您不能让他如愿以偿他会得寸进尺 侵占更多领土

translation.en: More and more people will suffer.
That is the proof.
I applaud your courage, young man.
translation.zh: 我欣赏你的勇气 年轻人

translation.en: But I have to give you a lesson in political reality.
translation.zh: 但我得给你上一堂政治现实课

translation.en: The people of Great Britain will never take up arms over a local border dispute.
translation.zh: 大英帝国的人民永远不会因为当地的边界争端 而跟人开战

translation.en: -It's so much more than a local border-- -As for what Hitler may do
translation.zh: 这不仅仅是当地的边界问题… 至于希特勒未来可能做什么

translation.en: or may not do in the future, well, we shall have to wait and see.
translation.zh: 或不做什么 我们只能静观其变

translation.en: -Wait and see is not-- -My sole objective here
translation.zh: 静观其变不是… 我此次前来的唯一目的就是避免短期内发生战争

translation.en: is to avert war in the immediate term,
translation.zh: 我此次前来的唯一目的就是避免短期内发生战争

translation.en: so I can begin to build a lasting peace.
translation.zh: 这样我才能开始建立持久的和平

translation.en: -There will be no lasting peace. -But I have to try!
translation.zh: 不会有持久的和平 但我必须努力一试！

translation.en: Look, the worst thing I could do is to walk away from this conference.
translation.zh: 听我说 我最不该做的就是退出会议

translation.en: If you do, there are people waiting, high up in the military,
translation.zh: 如果您退出会议会有军队高层的人等着

translation.en: a resistance, to bring him down.
translation.zh: 一支反抗军 会拿下希特勒

translation.en: -Well, why haven't they done so already? -They will if--
translation.zh: -那他们为何不行动呢？-他们会的 如果…

translation.en: I can't rely on some resistance
translation.zh: 你可能相信德国军队里有一支反抗军

translation.en: you may believe exists in the German army.
Well, I…
think you should…
take this back to wherever it came from.
No.
Keep it. Study it.
That is the political reality.
Now you're being impertinent.
And you are shaking hands with a man who hates everything you stand for!
translation.zh: 您与之握手的那个人他讨厌您所代表的一切！

translation.en: He is lying to you. He will go further and further.
translation.zh: 他在欺骗您 他会得寸进尺

translation.en: He will not stop, sir. He will never sto--
translation.zh: 他永远不会收手 先生 他永远不会…

translation.en: Thank you for your time.
Please don't sign the agreement.
Get rid of this.
I have to say, Legat,
I'm extremely disappointed in you.
[in French] Mr. President of the Council.
-Yes? -Thank you for your cooperation.
I think we have come to a very good agreement.
translation.zh: 我认为我们达成了一项非常好的协议

translation.en: -[in English] Prime Minister. -[Chamberlain] Ah. Nice to see you.
Oh, Monsieur Daladier. Did you get some dinner?
translation.zh: 达拉第先生 您用过晚餐了吗？

translation.en: [in German] There they are.
…the Czechs aren't here, given the circumstances.
translation.zh: …鉴于目前的情况 捷克人未到场

translation.en: Um… Oh, there's Monsieur Daladier. I want to--
[in French] Mr. Daladier, how was your dinner?
translation.zh: 达拉第先生 晚餐吃得还开心吗？

translation.en: -[in English] Sorry, we we both speaking. -[Chamberlain] Um, um… un sandwich?
translation.zh: 抱歉 我们差点同时开口

translation.en: -À tout à l'heure. -[man] It is very exciting…
[in German] Are you looking for someone?
Yes, thank you. About the arrangements for the press?
translation.zh: 是的 谢谢 关于媒体的安排？

translation.en: Who's responsible for that?
Enjoy the rest of your stay in Munich, Mr. Legat.
translation.zh: 祝你继续享受在慕尼黑的时光勒加特先生

translation.en: [in English] Oh bloody hell.
[in German] What did you want from him?
Can a British photographer be at the signing?
translation.zh: 英国摄影师能参加签约仪式吗？

translation.en: No chance.
Only the Führer's personal photographer has permission to take pictures.
translation.zh: 只有元首的私人摄影师可以拍照

translation.en: [in English] I'm sorry if I embarrassed you tonight.
translation.zh: 如果我今晚令你难堪 很抱歉

translation.en: I'm the one who should apologise.
What have you done with the document?
I will take it to London, find a more responsive audience.
translation.zh: 我会把它带回伦敦带给一个反应更积极的人看

translation.en: It won't be a waste.
-[man, in German] Gentlemen! -We should stop talking.
[Schmidt, in English] The Führer is pleased to invite you back to the library for the signing ceremony.
translation.zh: 元首很高兴邀请各位返回图书馆参加签约仪式

translation.en: -Prime Minister. -[Chamberlain] Good.
Duce, Monsieur Président du Conseil, Excellencies, gentlemen.
translation.zh: 领袖、部长会议主席各位阁下、先生们

translation.en: Please, this way.
Who's there?
[Paul] Open the door.
I want to show you something.
Now?
It's the only time we have.
Give me two minutes.
[Paul] You can talk to her.
She won't respond, but maybe she can hear.
translation.zh: 她不会回应 但她可能听得到

translation.en: Lena?
[in German] It's me, Hugh.
[in English] What happened?
We split up.
After your trip to Munich.
translation.zh: 就在你那次来慕尼黑之后

translation.en: How did she end up here?
She was arrested at a protest in '35
translation.zh: 她在1935年的一次抗议活动中被捕

translation.en: and sent to Moringen, the women's camp.
translation.zh: 然后被送到了莫林根的妇女集中营

translation.en: When they discovered she was Jewish…
translation.zh: 当他们发现她是犹太人时

translation.en: they were rough.
They said she fell out of a window.
translation.zh: 他们说她从窗户上摔下来

translation.en: I'm sure she did.
But not before they carved a Star of David onto her back.
translation.zh: 但在那之前 他们在她背上刻了一颗大卫星

translation.en: I knew he was racist.
translation.zh: 我早知道他是种族主义者

translation.en: All the awful Jewish stuff, I thought it could be put to one side.
translation.zh: 他对犹太人做的种种恶事我以为可以暂放一边

translation.en: How?
But you can't put it aside.
If they are capable of that, they are capable of anything.
translation.zh: 他们能做出那种事 就能做出任何事

translation.en: Lena knew that.
Yes, she did.
May I?
Shall we share?
What will you do?
Carry on.
In a few hours, I have to present a press summary to Hitler.
translation.zh: 几小时后 我要向希特勒提交一份新闻报道摘要

translation.en: I'm told he's taken a shine to me.
translation.zh: 我听说他开始喜欢我了

translation.en: Maybe it's a chance to really do something.
translation.zh: 或许这是做点实事的好机会

translation.en: What do you…
-How? -It would solve everything.
translation.zh: -怎么做？-一劳永逸地解决问题

translation.en: They'd kill you for even thinking about it.
translation.zh: 你哪怕只是有这个念头他们都会杀了你

translation.en: I have a pistol.
I might get a moment alone with him.
translation.zh: 我或许有机会跟他短暂独处

translation.en: Stop it!
Don't be stupid.
