I'll take the document to London. It will make a difference.
translation.zh: 我会把文件带到伦敦 会有改观

translation.en: Probably more talking, yes.
translation.zh: 可能会进行更多会谈 对

translation.en: -Yes, more talking. -I have to fight.
translation.zh: -对 更多会谈-我必须抗争

translation.en: You don't have to fight!
We don't choose the times we live in.
translation.zh: 我们不能选择自己生活的时代

translation.en: The only choice we have is how we respond.
translation.zh: 我们唯一的选择就是如何回应

translation.en: -You don't have to fight, Paul! We don't. -I have to fight. -We need to talk! We need to-- -I… have to fight!
translation.zh: -你不用抗争 保罗！我们得谈谈！-我必须抗争 我…必须抗争！

translation.en: -No, you don't! No! -No! It's my responsibility! Understand?
translation.zh: -不 你不用！不用！-不！这是我的责任！ 你明白吗？

translation.en: -Your responsibility? -Or I may as well blow my brains out.
translation.zh: 否则 我还不如一枪崩了自己

translation.en: There are other ways of doing things! Talk, discussion--
translation.zh: 还有其他办法！可以会谈、讨论…

translation.en: -There's no other things, no. -There's always hope!
translation.zh: -没有别的办法了 没有-总是有希望的！

translation.en: [sighs] Hoping is waiting for someone else to do it.
translation.zh: 希望就是等着别人去行动

translation.en: We'd all be much better off without it.
translation.zh: 我们不抱希望反而会更好

translation.en: I'd miss you.
Goodbye.
Goodbye.
REGINA PALACE HOTEL
-Hello. -Hello.
Bit early for a walk.
Yes.
I-- I couldn't sleep. I had to clear my head.
translation.zh: 我睡不着 得清醒一下头脑

translation.en: Are you all right?
-Why are you standing out here? -I'm looking for you.
translation.zh: -你站在外面干什么？-我在找你

translation.en: The PM's awake, and he wants to see you.
translation.zh: 首相醒了 他想见你

translation.en: -I heard you were looking for me, sir. -Ah! Legat. Good morning.
translation.zh: -听说您找我 先生-勒加特 早安

translation.en: Don't suppose you brought that copy of The Times with…
translation.zh: 你应该没带刊登了希特勒的演说

translation.en: with Hitler's speech in it, did you?
Yes, sir. I put it in your box, sir.
translation.zh: 是的 我放进您的箱子了 先生

translation.en: Oh, good man. Can you find it for me?
translation.zh: 你真好 能帮我找出来吗？

translation.en: Had a word with him last night.
Asked if I might see him again this morning before we fly back.
translation.zh: 问他我们飞回去前今早能否再见他一面

translation.en: -[Hugh] Asked who, sir? -Herr Hitler.
translation.zh: 问谁 先生？ 希特勒先生

translation.en: Did-- did he agree?
[chuckles] Couldn't really refuse.
Must say, that was a remarkably rude young man you brought to see me last night.
translation.zh: 不得不说 你昨晚带来见我的那个年轻人真是太粗鲁了

translation.en: -I really am sorry about that, sir. -Ah, thank you.
translation.zh: -我很抱歉 先生-啊 谢谢

translation.en: -Have you told anyone about it? -No.
Good. Neither have I.
His arguments were naive,
but… they were not ineffective.
Now, here we are.
Listen, I'd like you to take this to Wilson.
translation.zh: 听我说 我要你把这个带给威尔逊

translation.en: Ask him to turn it into a short statement of intent.
translation.zh: 让他据此起草一份简短的意向声明

translation.en: Just from there to there.
Sir, I don't follow.
Well, on Monday night, Hitler publicly declared his desire
translation.zh: 星期一晚上希特勒公开宣布了其意愿

translation.en: for a permanent peace between Germany and Great Britain.
translation.zh: 愿意在德国和英国之间维持永久和平

translation.en: -Yes. -Well, I'd like his undertaking redrafted.
translation.zh: -对-我希望重新起草他的承诺书

translation.en: -In the form of a joint statement. -A joint statement?
translation.zh: -以联合声明的形式-联合声明？

translation.en: To which both he and I can put our names this morning.
translation.zh: 今早他和我可以一起把名字签上去

translation.en: Oh, get on with it. Go on. Get it done.
translation.zh: 快去办吧 去吧 快点办完

translation.en: And get yourself a coffee. You're half awake.
translation.zh: 喝杯咖啡吧 你好像还没睡醒

translation.en: "We regard the agreement signed last night
as symbolic of the desire of our two peoples
translation.zh: 象征着两国人民的意愿

translation.en: never to go to war with one another again."
translation.zh: 永远不会再度彼此开战”

translation.en: I hope the PM realises this has no legal force whatsoever.
translation.zh: 我希望首相意识到这份宣言并没有任何法律效力

translation.en: -The man's not a fool. -What the hell's he playing at?
translation.zh: -他又不是傻瓜-那他到底在搞什么鬼？

translation.en: I've no idea. First I heard of it was half an hour ago.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我也是半小时前才听说的

translation.en: -Do you have it? -[Wilson] Yes.
-Good. -It may be a little long.
-What if he refuses to sign it? -[Chamberlain] Why should he?
translation.zh: -若是他拒绝签字呢？-他有何理由呢？

translation.en: These are all statements he's made already.
translation.zh: 这些都是他发表过的声明

translation.en: [Wilson] It doesn't mean he's going to stick with them.
It's symbolic, Horace.
translation.zh: 这是象征性的 霍勒斯

translation.en: Last night's agreement only settles a tiny dispute.
translation.zh: 昨晚的协定只是解决了一个小争端

translation.en: There will be others.
translation.zh: 还会有其他问题冒出来

translation.en: And I want him to publicly commit himself to peace.
translation.zh: 我希望他公开承诺会致力于和平

translation.en: Oh, Legat, make sure there's a car available at 11:00.
translation.zh: 勒加特 务必安排车11点来接我

translation.en: To the Führerbau?
No. Ah, you've put my name before his. It should be the other way around.
translation.zh: 不行 你把我的名字放在他的前面 应该反过来

translation.en: Otherwise, good.
Yes, I wanted to have a private meeting with him.
translation.zh: 是的 我想跟他私下见一面

translation.en: Man to man, no officials.
translation.zh: 我俩单独谈 不要有官员在场

translation.en: -He invited me to his apartment. -What?
-No officials? -Not even you, Horace.
translation.zh: -没有官员？-你也不行 霍勒斯

translation.en: Oh, for God's sake. You can't go and see Hitler entirely on your own.
translation.zh: 老天 您不能单独去见希特勒

translation.en: Can and will.
Gentlemen, we must rise to the level of events.
translation.zh: 先生们 我们提高对事件的重视程度

translation.en: What? Hey!
[in German] What are you doing here?
I mean, what the hell are you doing here in Munich?
translation.zh: 我问你到底来慕尼黑干什么？

translation.en: What are you doing here in Munich? What's going on here?
translation.zh: 你来慕尼黑干什么？这里是什么情况？

translation.en: What is going on here? Talk to me!
translation.zh: 这里是什么情况？说话啊！

translation.en: I don't know--
Now, let's talk. Come on. Talk to me!
translation.zh: 那我们来谈谈 来啊 说话啊！

translation.en: I would suggest you go back where you came from.
translation.zh: 我建议你从哪里来 滚回哪里去

translation.en: Legat. [spits]
Paul.
[Chamberlain] It was a specific point.
A bit of an embarrassment. Well, why was there…
translation.zh: 有点尴尬 怎么会有…

translation.en: [Wilson] With respect to-- There just is. I can't explain it any more.
translation.zh: 关于…就是这样 我无法再解释了

translation.en: -Prime Minister? -Yes?
-I should accompany you to the meeting. -No.
translation.zh: -我想我应该陪您去会面-不行

translation.en: I thought I had made this perfectly clear. No officials.
translation.zh: 我想我说得很清楚了 不要官员陪同

translation.en: Not as an official, sir. As a translator.
translation.zh: 我不是以官员身份去 长官是以翻译的身份

translation.en: No, I want him to feel this is a personal meeting.
translation.zh: 不行 我希望他觉得这是私人会面

translation.en: You need someone there to make sure your words are accurately reported.
translation.zh: 你需要有人在那里确保您的话被准确地传达

translation.en: -I-- -Remember what happened at Berchtesgaden -when he refused to give us a copy… -No, that--
translation.zh: 还记得在贝希特斯加登那次吗？他拒绝给我们提供一份…

translation.en: You can't trust Schmidt to have your back.
translation.zh: 您不能信任施密特 他不会支持您

translation.en: I think a translator could be useful.
translation.zh: 我想有个译员在会很有用

translation.en: -I'm the only one who speaks German. -All right, all right, all right!
translation.zh: 我是代表团中唯一会说德语的人 好啦！

translation.en: You can come, but be discreet.
translation.zh: 你可以去 但要谨慎

translation.en: Keep out of his eyeline. And mine.
translation.zh: 远离他的视线 还有我的

translation.en: -[reporters clamouring] -Mr. Chamberlain!
-Mr. Chamberlain! -Mr. Chamberlain!
[man] Good morning, Prime Minister.
-This way, sir. -Morning.
-[officer] Your wardrobe. -[whispers] They have the document.
-[Schmidt] Good morning. -[Chamberlain] Good morning.
-[Schmidt] Did you sleep well? -[Chamberlain] Very well.
translation.zh: -昨晚睡得好吗？-非常好 谢谢

translation.en: [Schmidt] I'm pleased to hear that, sir.
translation.zh: 很高兴听您这么说 先生

translation.en: [Chamberlain] We, the German Führer and British Prime Minister,
translation.zh: 我们 德国元首和英国首相

translation.en: are agreed in respect of the future of Anglo-German relations.
translation.zh: 就英德关系的未来达成了一致意见

translation.en: We regard the agreement signed last night
translation.zh: 我们认为昨晚签署的协定

translation.en: as symbolic of the desire of our two peoples
translation.zh: 永远不会再度彼此开战

translation.en: never to go to war with one another again.
translation.zh: 永远不再投入彼此之间的战争

translation.en: We are determined to continue to remove possible sources of difference
translation.zh: 我们决心继续消除可能会产生分歧的根源

translation.en: and to contribute to the peace of Europe.
translation.zh: 继续为欧洲和平做出贡献

translation.en: [in English] Prime Minister, I would like to thank you explicitly.
translation.zh: 首相 我要好好地感谢你

translation.en: [Schmidt, in English] I will accompany you back to your hotel.
Thank you, Herr Hitler.
And may I add
that there was never a doubt in my mind, sir,
as to the lengths to which you would go to protect Germany.
translation.zh: 为了保护德国 你会不遗余力

translation.en: [officer, in German] The foreign press summary!
[in English] Thank you. Come along, Legat.
translation.zh: 谢谢 走吧 勒加特

translation.en: [man, in German] The Reichsführer is arriving.
translation.zh: 党卫队全国领袖马上到

translation.en: Please excuse me, my Führer.
[Hitler] "The cheers for Hitler were mechanical and polite."
translation.zh: “对希特勒的欢呼麻木不仁仅是出于礼貌”

translation.en: "For Chamberlain, they were ecstatic."
translation.zh: “对张伯伦的到来却是欣喜若狂”

translation.en: You, as an educated German, what do you think? Are they right?
translation.zh: 身为一个受过教育的德国人你有何看法？他们说得对吗？

translation.en: I do not wish to be followed mechanically!
translation.zh: 我不希望别人麻木不仁地追随我！

translation.en: I gave Germany back its dignity.
Is it too much to ask for a little gratitude?
translation.zh: 要求他们有点感激之情难道很过分吗？

translation.en: "Mechanical."
They're grateful to this arsehole Chamberlain!
translation.zh: 他们却对张伯伦这混蛋感恩戴德！

translation.en: Am I the only one who realises that we have a historic task ahead of us?
translation.zh: 难道只有我一个人意识到我们面临着历史性的重任吗？

translation.en: That this is the moment for Germany to fulfil its destiny?
translation.zh: 只有我意识到这是德国完成使命的时刻吗？

translation.en: Speak. I want you to answer me.
translation.zh: 说话啊 我要你回答我

translation.en: Why aren't they grateful?
The people don't want a war. They're afraid.
translation.zh: 人民不希望打仗 他们害怕

translation.en: The people don't know what they want.
translation.zh: 人民不知道他们想要什么

translation.en: They're children.
But you're right. They are afraid.
translation.zh: 不过你说对了 他们害怕

translation.en: I am surrounded by cowardice.
Yes, my Führer.
I told you, I can read people.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过 我能看透别人

translation.en: You say yes,
but your eyes…
are saying no.
It's just you and I here.
So…
what are you thinking, von Hartmann?
translation.zh: 你在想什么呢 冯哈特曼？

translation.en: What do you…
want to say to me?
Nothing.
Heil, my Führer.
I'm told you've signed another agreement with Chamberlain?
translation.zh: 我听说您又跟张伯伦签了一份协议？

translation.en: Don't take that so seriously. That piece of paper is of no significance.
translation.zh: 别那么认真 那张纸毫无意义

translation.en: The problem lies here, with the German people.
translation.zh: 问题在这里 在德国人身上

translation.en: Anything else?
Thank you.
For…
this.
Thank you.
[in English] I hope you don't mind. They asked me to share a ride to the airport.
translation.zh: 希望你别介意他们让我搭便车去机场

translation.en: I'm glad to have a moment alone with you.
translation.zh: 我其实很高兴能和你单独待一会儿

translation.en: I haven't been altogether straight with you.
No?
No. I'm actually something of a guardian angel.
translation.zh: 对 我其实是守护天使

translation.en: What on earth are you talking about?
In London, you asked my surname.
translation.zh: 在伦敦时 你问我姓什么

translation.en: It's Menzies.
I think you know my uncle. He's a colonel in the Foreign Office.
translation.zh: 我想你认识我叔叔他是外交部的一名上校

translation.en: Well, he asked me to keep an eye on you out here.
Thank goodness I did.
I took it from your room last night when you went off with your friend.
translation.zh: 昨晚你和你朋友出去后我从你房间里拿的

translation.en: I think other parties were trying to find it this morning?
translation.zh: 我想今早其他人也在找它吧？

translation.en: [in German] I assume you're waiting for me?
No, actually.
No?
Not today, Paulie. Not today, but soon. Very soon.
translation.zh: 今天不是 小保罗今天不是 但很快就会 非常快

translation.en: Well, then.
-My regards-- -Get out.
[in English] Thank you.
Thank you, thank you.
Thank you, thank you, thank you.
-Thank-- -Enough!
Smoke?
Yes.
[Wilson] Sir.
Sir, we'll be on the ground in half an hour.
translation.zh: 长官 我们将在半小时后降落

translation.en: My God, I… fell asleep. Ooh.
Apparently, there's quite a crowd.
translation.zh: 显然 有很多人在等您

translation.en: The King has asked you to go direct to Buckingham Palace
translation.zh: 国王让您直接前往白金汉宫

translation.en: so their Majesties can thank you in person.
translation.zh: 这样国王和女王好亲自向您致谢

translation.en: Oh, God.
I shall have to speak to the cameras.
The world doesn't yet know about our joint statement.
translation.zh: 外界还不知道我们的联合声明

translation.en: Prime Minister, I urge you
to treat the undertaking given by Hitler with the utmost caution.
translation.zh: 对希特勒的承诺书要万分谨慎

translation.en: -Ah… -The agreement on the Sudetenland
translation.zh: 关于苏台德地区的协定是一回事但这份额外的文件…

translation.en: -is one thing, but this other document-- -Yes, I know. Horace, look.
translation.zh: 关于苏台德地区的协定是一回事但这份额外的文件… 是 我知道 霍勒斯 听我说

translation.en: If there's one thing I've learned from my dealings with Mr. Hitler,
translation.zh: 如果在跟希特勒先生打交道的过程中我学到了什么教训

translation.en: it's that you can't play poker with a gangster
without any cards up your sleeve.
What if he breaks his word? You'll look like a fool.
translation.zh: 如果他食言怎么办？你会出丑的

translation.en: Well, if he breaks his word, the world will see him for who he truly is!
translation.zh: 对 如果他食言全世界就会看清他的真面目！

translation.en: And it'll unite the Allies. Might even bring the Americans on board.
translation.zh: 这样一来 同盟国就会团结起来没准美国人也会加入进来

translation.en: And if I'm made to look a fool, well, it's a small price to pay.
translation.zh: 如果我出丑 这只是很小的代价

translation.en: Horace, I can only play the game with the cards I've been dealt.
translation.zh: 霍勒斯 我只能拿手头上的牌去玩

translation.en: What do you think, Legat? Do you think this will change the game?
translation.zh: 你觉得呢 勒加特？你觉得这会改变时局吗？

translation.en: I think there's a chance, Prime Minister.
So do I.
[Wilson] Look at that, Legat.
You'd think we won a war rather than avoided one.
translation.zh: 这让人觉得我们赢了战争而不是逃过一劫

translation.en: There are thousands of people gathering on the Mall.
translation.zh: 林荫大道上 有成千上万的人

translation.en: Welcome back, sir. Congratulations.
translation.zh: 欢迎回来 长官 祝贺

translation.en: [Wilson] The King intends to take him out onto the balcony.
translation.zh: 国王打算邀请他到阳台上去

translation.en: The settlement of the Czechoslovakian problem,
translation.zh: 捷克斯洛伐克问题的解决

translation.en: which has been achieved…
…uh, is in my mind
merely a prelude to a larger settlement,
translation.zh: 这仅是一个前奏 可以解决更大问题

translation.en: which, for all Europe,
may bring peace.
For this morning…
this morning I had another talk…
translation.zh: 今早我和德国总理希特勒先生

translation.en: …with the German Chancellor Herr Hitler.
Here is the paper
which bears his name upon it as well as mine.
translation.zh: 有他的签名 也有我的签名

translation.en: -Hello. -[sighs]
-Hello. -Hello.
Where's Arthur?
[sniffles] He's in the garden. He'll be happy to see you.
translation.zh: 他在花园 看到你他肯定会很开心

translation.en: I'm sorry for the way I left.
translation.zh: 我之前一走了之 对不起

translation.en: And, uh…
I wanted to say…
you were right.
I have felt disappointed.
And it's my fault, not yours.
translation.zh: 这是我的错 不是你的问题

translation.en: But there are some things I want to change.
translation.zh: 但有些事情 我想改变一下

translation.en: I think I might resign from the service.
And do what?
When war comes, I need to be…
translation.zh: 战争爆发时 我需要

translation.en: useful.
Don't laugh, but I think I might join the RAF.
translation.zh: 对 别笑 但我想我可能加入皇家空军

translation.en: What about the treaty? I thought he just said that--
translation.zh: 那个条约呢？我以为他说了…

translation.en: Just a delay. The PM's given us a chance of winning the damn thing when it happens.
translation.zh: 只起到延迟作用 战争爆发时首相给了我们打赢战争的机会

translation.en: It's quite some service when you think about it.
translation.zh: 仔细想想 这是很大的贡献

translation.en: But it's coming.
Sooner or later.
One day soon, we will have to fight. And we will have to win.
translation.zh: 不久的将来 我们不得不开打我们必须赢

translation.en: There must be something else that you can do.
translation.zh: 你肯定能做其他的事情

translation.en: -More talks, negotiations-- -There's no other way.
translation.zh: -更多会谈、谈判…-没有其他办法

translation.en: Don't say that.
There's always hope.
Yes.
And we'd all be much better off without it.
translation.zh: 我们不抱希望反而会更好

translation.en: -[running] -[Arthur] Daddy!
Here. Come here. Up a squeak.
translation.zh: 来吧 过来 举高高

translation.en: Oh, I've missed you.
[in German] I could have shot Hitler.
translation.zh: 我原本可以一枪毙了希特勒

translation.en: I was so close to him, I could smell his breath.
translation.zh: 我离他那么近 能闻到他的呼吸

translation.en: I could feel the gun in my hand.
But my hand wouldn't move.
Do you know why?
What would give me the right?
Do you want to keep going?
What other choice do we have?
They'll hang you for that one day.
translation.zh: 总有一天 他们会因此绞死你

translation.en: I know.
-♪ Turn to promises… ♪ -[Lena, in English] I'll take it.
-♪ You dream of summer… ♪ -Oh, you speak Russian as well, right?
translation.zh: 你也会说俄语 对吧？

translation.en: ♪ Of hearing bluebells chime ♪ ♪ Your golden locks ♪ -♪ Drenched in moonlight… ♪ -[ball-goers cheering]
translation.zh: （英德之间的和平仅持续了一年）

translation.en: ♪ As we watch the birds fly by ♪ ♪ Come dance with me ♪
translation.zh: （内维尔张伯伦遭到强烈谴责引咎辞去首相一职）

translation.en: ♪ Into the dark blue night ♪
translation.zh: （内维尔张伯伦遭到强烈谴责引咎辞去首相一职） （并于数月后去世）

translation.en: ♪ Into the dark blue night ♪
translation.zh: （通过《慕尼黑协定》争取到的额外时间） （让英国及其盟国得以充分备战）

translation.en: ♪ You dream of summer ♪
translation.zh: （改编自《慕尼黑》罗伯特哈里斯著）
